story:
Who are we?

Gratis Labs is one of the major new players in the telecommunications industry. The company was specifically formed to offer innovative telecommunications solutions to the most frequent problems phone service users encounter, as defined and specified by the Federal Communications Commission (FCC). The team at the core of the enterprise is made up of telecom and software engineers with decades of combined experience in telecommunications research and development, network integration, network operations and maintenance and large-scale project management. The company’s directors have worked on projects for American and European telecom giants. 

About this project

The Gratis project has been specifically designed and created to bring an all-encompassing telecommunications solution to the global market. Gratis is not just the “next generation” communications application to come onto the market. Rather, Gratis will undoubtedly be the market leader which changes the way people communicate…forever!

The following issues have been highlighted by the FCC as the most common problems faced by pre-paid phone card users (see this link for details: https://www.fcc.gov/document/pre-paid-phone-cards-tip-sheet):

  • Access numbers and/or PINs that don't work
  • Service or access numbers that are always busy
  • Card issuers going out of business, leaving people with useless cards and no means by which they can claim a refund
  • Rates that are higher – and often considerably higher – than advertised 
  • Imposition of mysterious and undisclosed "post-call" fees, which service providers deduct after the user completes a call
  • Imposition of even more mysterious and undisclosed "maintenance" fees, which the service providers deduct either after a call or at regular intervals
  • Service providers that charge users even when their call does not go through
  • Poor quality audio connections, including static, lag, echo, break-up, etc.
  • Cards that expire without the purchaser's knowledge and with no advance notice from the service provider 
  • Per-call fees charged in addition to the per-minute charges

The Gratis solution to these problems is as robust and reliable as it is easy to understand. Basically, the Gratis system has at its foundation an exceptional platform that can make call connections with amazingly high-definition audio quality. Equally as important, the actual time the user spends talking is the only thing for which that user is charged. In addition, Gratis has been designed for use as both an iPhone and Android app, so virtually any smart phone in the world will be able make and receive calls.

How can you say Gratis is the next big thing in telecommunications? What makes it so different?

Let’s look again at those annoying issues highlighted by the FCC and see how Gratis deals with each of them. Once again, Gratis is not just another phone app. It is an innovative telecommunications solution, which will forever change the way people communicate.

  • No access numbers required!  Once loaded, Gratis is integrated directly into your phone. Users never – repeat, never – have to call an access number or enter a PIN code. With Gratis, you can direct dial any phone number in your contacts list, or you can use the keypad.
  • No trips to the shop to buy credit! With Gratis, you can buy credits from within the application itself (or online), so you never have to go to a retail shop.
  • See what you pay for, every time. No hidden charges, no per-call or maintenance fees, ever! Every time you finish a call, Gratis provides a detailed call record, which includes the destination number, call start time, duration, total cost of the call and your balance. Don’t worry if you’re too busy to look at this information after every call. The entire log is held on your phone and always available through a user-friendly menu.
  • Share the wealth! With Gratis, you can transfer pre-paid call credits to any one of your family or friends, provided they have a pre-paid account.
  • Need to make a call but you’re out of credit? No problem! With Gratis, you can request an “Emergency” top-up. Once the request is made, $2 in credit will be added to your account, and the next time you top-up, that $2 will be taken off the top. Who else offers that kind of security in an emergency situation?
  • Unrivalled call quality. With Gratis, it doesn’t matter whether you’re phoning a landline or mobile, or making free calls (Gratis to Gratis). The audio quality is crystal clear and utterly reliable, every time.
  • Credits never expire! With Gratis, you don’t have to worry about unused credit being subject to expiry dates. That’s just not fair, and Gratis will never allow it to happen to any of its users, ever.

Gratis so far… 

The engineers at Gratis Labs have already developed a platform that can support up to 500,000 users. As already noted, the company has developed a Gratis solution for both iPhone and Android users, which means the vast majority of mobile phone users around the world already have phones which will be able to use Gratis. 

However, Gratis does much more – infinitely more – than just make and receive calls.  Remember, we told you that this is an innovative telecommunications solution, and people today do much more than just talk on the phone. 

Ok, then, what else can Gratis do?

For starters, Gratis can send and receive chat messages, photos and videos, but you’re probably thinking that there are a few apps out there that can do that, too. Well, then, can those apps also translate chat messages (in real time) in no less than 64 languages? Because Gratis can! Whether you want to chat with foreign friends, clients, customers or the mysterious person you met while vacationing abroad, Gratis allows you to send a chat message in your own language, which will be simultaneously translated into the language of your choice. This feature is unique to the Gratis telecommunications solution.

Well, that’s impressive. Anything else?

As a matter of fact, yes! Gratis offers two other features that people are already raving about. The first is a “Recall” function. Let’s be honest with each other. We’ve probably all, at one time or another, sent a message, photo or video that we really – I mean REALLY – wished we hadn’t. Until Gratis came along, once that message was sent, there was no going back. However, the “Recall” function actually allows you to “take back” any message you’ve sent to any device. If the other user hasn’t gone online or doesn’t have Gratis switched on, they’ll never even know you’ve sent the message. If they have Gratis switched on but haven’t seen the message/photo/video, they’ll receive a notification that a message came in, but they won’t be able to see the actual message itself. Even if they’ve already seen the message, you can still delete it from their device. With Gratis, you’re in charge of the information you send, even after you’ve sent it and even if you wish you hadn’t sent it!

The other amazing feature offered by Gratis is something a lot more fun. Gratis isn’t just about high-tech wizardry, you know. Anyone with the Gratis app can customize their app screen. You can change the image, theme and even the colour.  Imagine being able to match your phone app to your wardrobe! With Gratis, you can.

Finally, some of our so-called competitors have found it necessary to have advertising pop-ups, which countless users have reported to find frustrating, annoying and even the source of unwelcome viruses! Gratis does not allow advertisers to communicate over the app and never will. 

Apart from these impressive features, why else should I join Gratis?

Well, let’s see. We’ve talked about all the things Gratis can do, so why else would you want to use this system? The most obvious answer is…money! Gratis offers the lowest-priced calls/texts/messages on the planet, and that’s a fact. Just look at the ways you can save money compared to the system you’re using now:

  • Make enormous savings on long distance and international calls.
  • Get rid of your expensive call plans, many of which don’t even include international calls.
  • Make exceptional savings when sending international SMS messages.
  • Say goodbye to those outrageous and painfully expensive roaming charges!
  • Never lose money due to expired call credits.
  • Every call you make to other Gratis users is completely free of charge.

This all sounds good! How do I get Gratis on my phone, and how much does it cost?

The answer to the first question is simple, and the answer to the second question is even better. Android users can already go to our website, http://gratislabs.com to download Gratis. For those with an iPhone, Gratis are pleased to announce that they have developed an iPhone version of the Gratis app and sent it to Apple for approval. Gratis Labs fully expects this version to be approved within the coming days. We will notify our friends and sponsors as soon as that approval has been received, on our website and our Facebook page.  

Once Gratis “goes live,” you will be able to go to the appropriate site and download the Gratis app. When the download is complete, a Gratis icon is clearly displayed on your phone. To use Gratis, just tap the icon and follow the extremely easy installation instructions on your screen. You’ll be happy to know that your mobile phone number is your user name, and no password is required!

As to how much the Gratis solution costs, many people expect that, because Gratis does not allow advertising through the app, it will be expensive.  Nothing could be further from the truth. The Gratis app is 100 percent free to download.

Gratis going forward…

Gratis Labs is now prepared to launch this amazing new telecommunications solution to the world on a commercial basis. For now, however, only our sponsors/backers and the friends they invite to join them will have access to this miraculous new telecommunications solution. The interest being expressed by the industry and users across the planet has been enormous. It appears virtually certain that within a very short period of time, many millions of people will be saving money by using Gratis for the vast majority of their communication needs.

At this time, the existing platform cannot accommodate the millions of people who want to use the Gratis app. The company is targeting investment of $30,000, which will allow Gratis Labs to launch the service on a commercial basis. That investment would allow the company to invest in the high-capacity, high-performance servers and other hardware necessary to service the first one million users. Once that is accomplished, funding should be in place to increase capacity to up to 100 million users. 

For more information, you can visit the Gratis website, www.gratislabs.com, or follow us on Facebook or Twitter.

Once Gratis is installed on your phone, topping up is simple! Just tap on the “More” menu and select “Shop.” Finally, tap “Top-Up.” Select your choice of $4.99, $9.99 or $19.99 blocks of credit. As soon as the transaction is completed, the new balance will be displayed to include the top-up value.

Alternatively, users can opt for one of the many exceptional Gratis package deals on offer. The package information is displayed on a different backdrop and with a different theme to the top-up options, which also gives users some idea of how they can customize their own app.

Once I’ve loaded Gratis on my phone, how do I use it to make calls?

The user can now make “Gratis Out” calls, which refers to paid calls made using the Gratis app.  To call any number, you can dial as normal after selecting “Keypad.” Use the keypad as you would for any standard call, or you can select one of your existing contacts. Once the call is complete, a detailed record of the call will be saved in the “Call Detail” page, where users can see the number called, the date, time, duration and total cost of the call, as well as the remaining balance.

How is using Gratis better than using a standard pre-paid phone card?

  • To start, all calls from one Gratis user to another are free, regardless of where the two parties are in the world. But let’s say the person you want to call is not online. Gratis will inform you of that fact and then suggest the most economical way to make a “Gratis Out” call to that same contact. 
  • Gratis only charges for calls that have actually been connected.
  • Gratis call credits never expire. Never. You can use your credit without having to top-up for one year, five years, even 20 years, if you like.
  • The audio quality using Gratis is far superior to that experienced when making a standard mobile phone call.
  • You can keep your existing SIM card. With Gratis, there’s no need to change.
  • Gratis offers 24/7/365 support to all its customers. The app even has a support page where users can log any problem or query. Gratis guarantees that they will respond to that query within one hour, day or night.

How do I buy Gratis pre-paid phone cards? 

Call credits can be purchased by selecting one of the “Top-up Perks” on the left side of this page.  Top-up values of $20, $50 and $100 are available. In addition, buyers receive 10% additional credit when you buy one of the perks on this page. 

Call credits to the value of $4.99, $9.99 and $19.99 can also be purchased inside the app itself, or via our website http://www.gratislabs.com . Please note that the additional 10% credit is not available when you use either of those options.  

You could also choose to select Gratis packages that contain a specific number of hours to call landlines and mobiles in selected countries. These call rates are exceptionally low and offer the best value in the global telecommunications market. Any of the packages shown on the left side of this page can be purchased by selecting the “Package perk” and following the instructions. Packages may also be purchased inside the app or on our website  http://www.gratislabs.com . Please note that any of the packages bought as a Gratis Perk have the very lowest calling rates, even compared to similar package purchased inside the app or on our website.  

How does Gratis compare with Skype, the “main competitor”?

  • Gratis does not allow advertisements to be displayed anywhere on the app. Skype, however, has annoying, unwanted pop-up ads which can appear at any time. 
  • Gratis never charges per-call connection fees. Skype, on the other hand, charges connection fees of 4.9 cents or 8.9 cents per call, regardless of the length of that call. Those charges are outrageously expensive. At times, the connection cost is more than the actual call cost. The tables below compare Gratis and Skype call costs for one-minute and three-minute calls. For accuracy, we have included the Skype connection charges in the call cost.  Please note: Global telecom statistics indicate that the average call lasts approximately three minutes.

This chart shows charges for a one-minute call. The prices are shown in U.S cents

Country                      GRATIS                                   SKYPE

                                  Landline/Mobile                  Landline/Mobile

USA                                  1.9    /   1.9                            7.7   /   7.7

Canada                            1.9    /   1.9                            7.7   /   7.7

China                               1.5   /   1.5                              6.9   /   6.9

Cuba                                68.4 / 68.4                           105.9 / 105.9

Dominican Republic      5.0 / 6.9                               21.29 / 28.12

France                             2.2  /  4.6                               7.7   /   21.0

Germany                         2.2  /  6.7                               7.7   /   21.0

Mexico                             1.0  /  3.4                               5.9   /   13.4

India                                 2.1  /  2.1                                6.4   /    6.4

Peru                                 2.1  /  8.6                               7.7   /   25.9

Poland                             2.2  /  2.2                              7.2   /   7.2

UK                                    2.2  /  6.7                               7.7   /   21.0

This chart shows charges for a three-minute call. The prices are shown in U.S cents

Country                         GRATIS                                SKYPE

                                   Landline/Mobile                Landline/Mobile

USA                                  5.7    /   5.7                            13.3   /   13.3

Canada                            5.7    /   5.7                            13.3   /   13.3

China                               4.5   /   4.5                            10.9   /   10.9

Cuba                                205.2 / 205.2                      299.9 / 299.9

Dominican Republic     15.0 / 37.2                            42.8 / 66.5

France                             6.6  /  13.8                            13.3  /   45.2

Germany                         6.6  /  20.1                            13.3   /   45.2

Mexico                            3.0  /  10.2                             7.9   /   19.4

Peru                                 6.3  /  25.8                            13.3   /   59.9

Poland                             6.6  /  6.6                              11.8   /   11.8

UK                                    6.6  /  20.1                            13.3   /   45.2 

The above charts clearly show that Skype is at least three times more expensive than Gratis for a one-minute call. To be fair, we should point out that Skype is only twice as expensive as Gratis for a three-minute call. As the average duration of a call is approximately three minutes, we can only say with certainty that Gratis calls cost just half of what Skype calls will take out of your pocket.

We have made several references to the call quality you can expect to enjoy through the Gratis solution. We’d like to back up these claims by inviting you to download the Gratis app at http://gratislabs.com. Invite your friends to download the app, and then make some free calls. You’ll be amazed at the audio quality, which is vastly superior to anything offered by Skype.

Will any of the Gratis pre-paid phone cards or Gratis Packages be available for retail purchase later on? 

Anyone (including distributing companies and retailers) can purchase the Gratis Perks during the launch campaign at the same price as any member of the general public who decides to take part in the crowdfunding campaign. 

To make your Gratis experience even better (and less expensive), if you purchase a top-up of $500 or more using one of the Gratis Perk options, we will give you between 15 and 25% additional value, and we will also provide an app that can be used to resell our products, allowing you to recoup that 15% to 25% margin.

Why should I trust Gratis?

Gratis Labs wholeheartedly believes that this new communications solution is the best pre-paid phone system on the market today. We trust the audio quality of our voice calls, and we know that we have the best call rates on the global market. Therefore, we can make the following unconditional offer:  If you are not happy with the voice quality of your Gratis calls or the call rates on offer, we will refund in full the remaining call credits on your pre-paid account. For package users, we will refund the remaining value of your existing package on a pro-rata basis. This refund is also applicable to Top-up Perks and Package Perks. No strings attached. 

To receive your refund won’t require endless texts, calls and emails, either. In the extremely unlikely event that you’re not happy with your Gratis package, simply fill in the CONTACT page in the app, where you can request your refund. Refund processing takes an average of just one to five days, depending on the payment method you used to buy your package/minutes. Try getting a refund from Skype that fast…or at all, for that matter!

What we have achieved thus far... 

We have developed a stable, reliable voice platform that can handle all calls made and received by Gratis users. 

We have developed an equally reliable SMS platform which can handle all SMS messages sent from the Gratis app.

We have also developed a chat platform which can handle all chat messages, photos and videos sent and received by the Gratis app.

In addition, we have developed a unique and truly amazing translation platform, which at the tap of an icon can translate your chat messages into a language understood by the person who is receiving the message. This translation feature will allow people who do not speak the same language to chat in real time, with each person writing in the language of their choice. This feature can be also be used for business purposes, as well as for personal chats. Imagine a feature that will allow a grandmother to communicate with her grandchildren, who are growing up abroad and do not speak the same language.

Gratis is no longer merely on the drawing board. After years of research and fine-tuning, we have already invested in infrastructure that can handle up to 500,000 users.

To ensure we can offer the Gratis service to the widest possible range of users across the world, we have developed both iPhone and Android apps, both of which will enable users to make and receive voice calls, chat messages, SMS texts, photos and videos. The app has been fully tested and has without question reached commercial launch level.  Please download the app at http://gratislabs.com; you will enjoy it!

We have also created a website, where you can learn all about the Gratis solution: www.gratislabs.com

Where our sponsors fit in ... 

We need at least an additional $30,000 in investment to launch a global commercial service. This funding is needed for hardware requirements, including high-capacity, high-performance servers, which will increase our existing capacity from 500,000 to 1 million users.

If we receive more funding than our targeted goal, Gratis Labs will invest the additional funds to expand our capacity to several hundred million users, as follows:

At $30 000 of additional investment, we can increase capacity to 1 million users.

At $100 000, we can increase capacity to 2 million users.

At $250 000, we can increase capacity to 5 million users.

At $500 000, we can increase capacity to 10 million users.

At $2,500,000, we can increase capacity to 50 million users.

At $5,000,000, we can increase our capacity to a staggering 100 million users.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot or do not wish to contribute financially, it doesn't mean you can't help Gratis get started. Please, get the word out and make some noise about our campaign. To make it even easier to spread the news about Gratis, you can use the Indiegogo share tools.

Proposed Timeframe

The total amount of time we have dedicated to setting up the new infrastructure required to handle 1 million users is two months. The GRATIS application itself, however, is already fully developed and available at http://gratislabs.com  for Android users. As already stated, we expect to receive approval from Apple for the iPhone version within the next few days.

Details of the proposed roll-out phases are as follows:

  • Month One: Hardware and software installation for voice platform, SMS platform and chat platform.
  • Months One to Two:  Deploy the product platform and perform load performance tests for inter-operability,
  • End of Month Two:  Open the application to 1 million additional users. 


FAQs

I want to get involved but I don't want a perk.

In this case, you should NOT select a perk when adding your contribution.

What countries are included in the USA, Mexico … Package? 

The USA, Mexico… Package includes incredibly low-cost calls to the countries shown below:

USA, Mexico, Canada, China, India  

EUROPE (27) : Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom

What countries are included in the World Package? 

The World Package includes incredibly low-cost calls to the 59 countries shown below:

*AMERICA (14): Bermuda, Canada, Chile, Colombia, Costa Rica, French Guiana, Guadeloupe, Martinique, Mexico, Peru, Puerto Rico, USA, Venezuela, U.S. Virgin Islands

ASIA (13) : Bangladesh, Brunei Darussalam, China, Guam, Hong Kong, India, Indonesia, South Korea, Malaysia, Mongolia, Pakistan, Singapore, Thailand

EUROPE (27) : Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom

MIDDLE EAST (1): Israel

OCEANIA (2): Australia, New Zealand

AFRICA (2): Nigeria, South Africa

Can I use Gratis before the end of the Crowdfunding campaign?

Yes! If you decide to get on board and select any of the packages on this page, you (and any friends you choose to invite) can use Gratis from today and start enjoying free and low-cost calls. Even if you do not receive an additional 10% of credit by purchasing a Gratis Perk, you will still be getting the lowest possible call costs and the very best call quality. You can make a payment inside the app itself, or on our website, www.gratislabs.com. 

As already stated, the Gratis app for iPhones should be available within the next few days. Android users should go to http://gratislabs.com to download the app.

story_txt:
Who are we?
Gratis Labs is one of the major new players in the telecommunications industry. The company was specifically formed to offer innovative telecommunications solutions to the most frequent problems phone service users encounter, as defined and specified by the Federal Communications Commission (FCC). The team at the core of the enterprise is made up of telecom and software engineers with decades of combined experience in telecommunications research and development, network integration, network operations and maintenance and large-scale project management. The company’s directors have worked on projects for American and European telecom giants. 
About this project
The Gratis project has been specifically designed and created to bring an all-encompassing telecommunications solution to the global market. Gratis is not just the “next generation” communications application to come onto the market. Rather, Gratis will undoubtedly be the market leader which changes the way people communicate…forever!
The following issues have been highlighted by the FCC as the most common problems faced by pre-paid phone card users (see this link for details: https://www.fcc.gov/document/pre-paid-phone-cards-tip-sheet):

Access numbers and/or PINs that don't work
Service or access numbers that are always busy
Card issuers going out of business, leaving people with useless cards and no means by which they can claim a refund
Rates that are higher – and often considerably higher – than advertised 
Imposition of mysterious and undisclosed "post-call" fees, which service providers deduct after the user completes a call
Imposition of even more mysterious and undisclosed "maintenance" fees, which the service providers deduct either after a call or at regular intervals
Service providers that charge users even when their call does not go through
Poor quality audio connections, including static, lag, echo, break-up, etc.
Cards that expire without the purchaser's knowledge and with no advance notice from the service provider 
Per-call fees charged in addition to the per-minute charges

The Gratis solution to these problems is as robust and reliable as it is easy to understand. Basically, the Gratis system has at its foundation an exceptional platform that can make call connections with amazingly high-definition audio quality. Equally as important, the actual time the user spends talking is the only thing for which that user is charged. In addition, Gratis has been designed for use as both an iPhone and Android app, so virtually any smart phone in the world will be able make and receive calls.
How can you say Gratis is the next big thing in telecommunications? What makes it so different?
Let’s look again at those annoying issues highlighted by the FCC and see how Gratis deals with each of them. Once again, Gratis is not just another phone app. It is an innovative telecommunications solution, which will forever change the way people communicate.

No access numbers required!  Once loaded, Gratis is integrated directly into your phone. Users never – repeat, never – have to call an access number or enter a PIN code. With Gratis, you can direct dial any phone number in your contacts list, or you can use the keypad.
No trips to the shop to buy credit! With Gratis, you can buy credits from within the application itself (or online), so you never have to go to a retail shop.
See what you pay for, every time. No hidden charges, no per-call or maintenance fees, ever! Every time you finish a call, Gratis provides a detailed call record, which includes the destination number, call start time, duration, total cost of the call and your balance. Don’t worry if you’re too busy to look at this information after every call. The entire log is held on your phone and always available through a user-friendly menu.
Share the wealth! With Gratis, you can transfer pre-paid call credits to any one of your family or friends, provided they have a pre-paid account.
Need to make a call but you’re out of credit? No problem! With Gratis, you can request an “Emergency” top-up. Once the request is made, $2 in credit will be added to your account, and the next time you top-up, that $2 will be taken off the top. Who else offers that kind of security in an emergency situation?
Unrivalled call quality. With Gratis, it doesn’t matter whether you’re phoning a landline or mobile, or making free calls (Gratis to Gratis). The audio quality is crystal clear and utterly reliable, every time.
Credits never expire! With Gratis, you don’t have to worry about unused credit being subject to expiry dates. That’s just not fair, and Gratis will never allow it to happen to any of its users, ever.

Gratis so far… 
The engineers at Gratis Labs have already developed a platform that can support up to 500,000 users. As already noted, the company has developed a Gratis solution for both iPhone and Android users, which means the vast majority of mobile phone users around the world already have phones which will be able to use Gratis. 
However, Gratis does much more – infinitely more – than just make and receive calls.  Remember, we told you that this is an innovative telecommunications solution, and people today do much more than just talk on the phone. 


Ok, then, what else can Gratis do?
For starters, Gratis can send and receive chat messages, photos and videos, but you’re probably thinking that there are a few apps out there that can do that, too. Well, then, can those apps also translate chat messages (in real time) in no less than 64 languages? Because Gratis can! Whether you want to chat with foreign friends, clients, customers or the mysterious person you met while vacationing abroad, Gratis allows you to send a chat message in your own language, which will be simultaneously translated into the language of your choice. This feature is unique to the Gratis telecommunications solution.
Well, that’s impressive. Anything else?
As a matter of fact, yes! Gratis offers two other features that people are already raving about. The first is a “Recall” function. Let’s be honest with each other. We’ve probably all, at one time or another, sent a message, photo or video that we really – I mean REALLY – wished we hadn’t. Until Gratis came along, once that message was sent, there was no going back. However, the “Recall” function actually allows you to “take back” any message you’ve sent to any device. If the other user hasn’t gone online or doesn’t have Gratis switched on, they’ll never even know you’ve sent the message. If they have Gratis switched on but haven’t seen the message/photo/video, they’ll receive a notification that a message came in, but they won’t be able to see the actual message itself. Even if they’ve already seen the message, you can still delete it from their device. With Gratis, you’re in charge of the information you send, even after you’ve sent it and even if you wish you hadn’t sent it!
The other amazing feature offered by Gratis is something a lot more fun. Gratis isn’t just about high-tech wizardry, you know. Anyone with the Gratis app can customize their app screen. You can change the image, theme and even the colour.  Imagine being able to match your phone app to your wardrobe! With Gratis, you can.
Finally, some of our so-called competitors have found it necessary to have advertising pop-ups, which countless users have reported to find frustrating, annoying and even the source of unwelcome viruses! Gratis does not allow advertisers to communicate over the app and never will. 
Apart from these impressive features, why else should I join Gratis?
Well, let’s see. We’ve talked about all the things Gratis can do, so why else would you want to use this system? The most obvious answer is…money! Gratis offers the lowest-priced calls/texts/messages on the planet, and that’s a fact. Just look at the ways you can save money compared to the system you’re using now:

Make enormous savings on long distance and international calls.
Get rid of your expensive call plans, many of which don’t even include international calls.
Make exceptional savings when sending international SMS messages.
Say goodbye to those outrageous and painfully expensive roaming charges!
Never lose money due to expired call credits.
Every call you make to other Gratis users is completely free of charge.

This all sounds good! How do I get Gratis on my phone, and how much does it cost?
The answer to the first question is simple, and the answer to the second question is even better. Android users can already go to our website, http://gratislabs.com to download Gratis. For those with an iPhone, Gratis are pleased to announce that they have developed an iPhone version of the Gratis app and sent it to Apple for approval. Gratis Labs fully expects this version to be approved within the coming days. We will notify our friends and sponsors as soon as that approval has been received, on our website and our Facebook page.  
Once Gratis “goes live,” you will be able to go to the appropriate site and download the Gratis app. When the download is complete, a Gratis icon is clearly displayed on your phone. To use Gratis, just tap the icon and follow the extremely easy installation instructions on your screen. You’ll be happy to know that your mobile phone number is your user name, and no password is required!
As to how much the Gratis solution costs, many people expect that, because Gratis does not allow advertising through the app, it will be expensive.  Nothing could be further from the truth. The Gratis app is 100 percent free to download.
Gratis going forward…
Gratis Labs is now prepared to launch this amazing new telecommunications solution to the world on a commercial basis. For now, however, only our sponsors/backers and the friends they invite to join them will have access to this miraculous new telecommunications solution. The interest being expressed by the industry and users across the planet has been enormous. It appears virtually certain that within a very short period of time, many millions of people will be saving money by using Gratis for the vast majority of their communication needs.
At this time, the existing platform cannot accommodate the millions of people who want to use the Gratis app. The company is targeting investment of $30,000, which will allow Gratis Labs to launch the service on a commercial basis. That investment would allow the company to invest in the high-capacity, high-performance servers and other hardware necessary to service the first one million users. Once that is accomplished, funding should be in place to increase capacity to up to 100 million users. 
For more information, you can visit the Gratis website, www.gratislabs.com, or follow us on Facebook or Twitter.
Once Gratis is installed on your phone, topping up is simple! Just tap on the “More” menu and select “Shop.” Finally, tap “Top-Up.” Select your choice of $4.99, $9.99 or $19.99 blocks of credit. As soon as the transaction is completed, the new balance will be displayed to include the top-up value.
Alternatively, users can opt for one of the many exceptional Gratis package deals on offer. The package information is displayed on a different backdrop and with a different theme to the top-up options, which also gives users some idea of how they can customize their own app.
Once I’ve loaded Gratis on my phone, how do I use it to make calls?
The user can now make “Gratis Out” calls, which refers to paid calls made using the Gratis app.  To call any number, you can dial as normal after selecting “Keypad.” Use the keypad as you would for any standard call, or you can select one of your existing contacts. Once the call is complete, a detailed record of the call will be saved in the “Call Detail” page, where users can see the number called, the date, time, duration and total cost of the call, as well as the remaining balance.
How is using Gratis better than using a standard pre-paid phone card?

To start, all calls from one Gratis user to another are free, regardless of where the two parties are in the world. But let’s say the person you want to call is not online. Gratis will inform you of that fact and then suggest the most economical way to make a “Gratis Out” call to that same contact. 
Gratis only charges for calls that have actually been connected.
Gratis call credits never expire. Never. You can use your credit without having to top-up for one year, five years, even 20 years, if you like.
The audio quality using Gratis is far superior to that experienced when making a standard mobile phone call.
You can keep your existing SIM card. With Gratis, there’s no need to change.
Gratis offers 24/7/365 support to all its customers. The app even has a support page where users can log any problem or query. Gratis guarantees that they will respond to that query within one hour, day or night.

How do I buy Gratis pre-paid phone cards? 
Call credits can be purchased by selecting one of the “Top-up Perks” on the left side of this page.  Top-up values of $20, $50 and $100 are available. In addition, buyers receive 10% additional credit when you buy one of the perks on this page. 
Call credits to the value of $4.99, $9.99 and $19.99 can also be purchased inside the app itself, or via our website http://www.gratislabs.com . Please note that the additional 10% credit is not available when you use either of those options.  
You could also choose to select Gratis packages that contain a specific number of hours to call landlines and mobiles in selected countries. These call rates are exceptionally low and offer the best value in the global telecommunications market. Any of the packages shown on the left side of this page can be purchased by selecting the “Package perk” and following the instructions. Packages may also be purchased inside the app or on our website  http://www.gratislabs.com . Please note that any of the packages bought as a Gratis Perk have the very lowest calling rates, even compared to similar package purchased inside the app or on our website.  
How does Gratis compare with Skype, the “main competitor”?

Gratis does not allow advertisements to be displayed anywhere on the app. Skype, however, has annoying, unwanted pop-up ads which can appear at any time. 
Gratis never charges per-call connection fees. Skype, on the other hand, charges connection fees of 4.9 cents or 8.9 cents per call, regardless of the length of that call. Those charges are outrageously expensive. At times, the connection cost is more than the actual call cost. The tables below compare Gratis and Skype call costs for one-minute and three-minute calls. For accuracy, we have included the Skype connection charges in the call cost.  Please note: Global telecom statistics indicate that the average call lasts approximately three minutes.

The above charts clearly show that Skype is at least three times more expensive than Gratis for a one-minute call. To be fair, we should point out that Skype is only twice as expensive as Gratis for a three-minute call. As the average duration of a call is approximately three minutes, we can only say with certainty that Gratis calls cost just half of what Skype calls will take out of your pocket.
We have made several references to the call quality you can expect to enjoy through the Gratis solution. We’d like to back up these claims by inviting you to download the Gratis app at http://gratislabs.com. Invite your friends to download the app, and then make some free calls. You’ll be amazed at the audio quality, which is vastly superior to anything offered by Skype.
Will any of the Gratis pre-paid phone cards or Gratis Packages be available for retail purchase later on? 
Anyone (including distributing companies and retailers) can purchase the Gratis Perks during the launch campaign at the same price as any member of the general public who decides to take part in the crowdfunding campaign. 
To make your Gratis experience even better (and less expensive), if you purchase a top-up of $500 or more using one of the Gratis Perk options, we will give you between 15 and 25% additional value, and we will also provide an app that can be used to resell our products, allowing you to recoup that 15% to 25% margin.


Why should I trust Gratis?
Gratis Labs wholeheartedly believes that this new communications solution is the best pre-paid phone system on the market today. We trust the audio quality of our voice calls, and we know that we have the best call rates on the global market. Therefore, we can make the following unconditional offer:  If you are not happy with the voice quality of your Gratis calls or the call rates on offer, we will refund in full the remaining call credits on your pre-paid account. For package users, we will refund the remaining value of your existing package on a pro-rata basis. This refund is also applicable to Top-up Perks and Package Perks. No strings attached. 
To receive your refund won’t require endless texts, calls and emails, either. In the extremely unlikely event that you’re not happy with your Gratis package, simply fill in the CONTACT page in the app, where you can request your refund. Refund processing takes an average of just one to five days, depending on the payment method you used to buy your package/minutes. Try getting a refund from Skype that fast…or at all, for that matter!
What we have achieved thus far... 
We have developed a stable, reliable voice platform that can handle all calls made and received by Gratis users. 
We have developed an equally reliable SMS platform which can handle all SMS messages sent from the Gratis app.
We have also developed a chat platform which can handle all chat messages, photos and videos sent and received by the Gratis app.
In addition, we have developed a unique and truly amazing translation platform, which at the tap of an icon can translate your chat messages into a language understood by the person who is receiving the message. This translation feature will allow people who do not speak the same language to chat in real time, with each person writing in the language of their choice. This feature can be also be used for business purposes, as well as for personal chats. Imagine a feature that will allow a grandmother to communicate with her grandchildren, who are growing up abroad and do not speak the same language.
Gratis is no longer merely on the drawing board. After years of research and fine-tuning, we have already invested in infrastructure that can handle up to 500,000 users.
To ensure we can offer the Gratis service to the widest possible range of users across the world, we have developed both iPhone and Android apps, both of which will enable users to make and receive voice calls, chat messages, SMS texts, photos and videos. The app has been fully tested and has without question reached commercial launch level.  Please download the app at http://gratislabs.com; you will enjoy it!
We have also created a website, where you can learn all about the Gratis solution: www.gratislabs.com
Where our sponsors fit in ... 
We need at least an additional $30,000 in investment to launch a global commercial service. This funding is needed for hardware requirements, including high-capacity, high-performance servers, which will increase our existing capacity from 500,000 to 1 million users.
If we receive more funding than our targeted goal, Gratis Labs will invest the additional funds to expand our capacity to several hundred million users, as follows:
At $30 000 of additional investment, we can increase capacity to 1 million users.
At $100 000, we can increase capacity to 2 million users.
At $250 000, we can increase capacity to 5 million users.
At $500 000, we can increase capacity to 10 million users.
At $2,500,000, we can increase capacity to 50 million users.
At $5,000,000, we can increase our capacity to a staggering 100 million users.
Other Ways You Can Help
If you cannot or do not wish to contribute financially, it doesn't mean you can't help Gratis get started. Please, get the word out and make some noise about our campaign. To make it even easier to spread the news about Gratis, you can use the Indiegogo share tools.
Proposed Timeframe
The total amount of time we have dedicated to setting up the new infrastructure required to handle 1 million users is two months. The GRATIS application itself, however, is already fully developed and available at http://gratislabs.com  for Android users. As already stated, we expect to receive approval from Apple for the iPhone version within the next few days.
Details of the proposed roll-out phases are as follows:

Month One: Hardware and software installation for voice platform, SMS platform and chat platform.
Months One to Two:  Deploy the product platform and perform load performance tests for inter-operability,
End of Month Two:  Open the application to 1 million additional users.

story:
Introduction

Nye's Pharmacy sign has heralded the beloved Conway structure since 1953, but it's in need of some care. North Conway resident Jerry Stevens and Conway Cultural Development Corporation have teamed up to raise funds to restore the sign to its original glorious condition.

Background

Many Conway locals have fond memories of Nye's Pharmacy - folks are passionate about this place. In the 1950's and 60's the promise of Nye's was used to bribe kids to behave during a dreaded visit to the doctor. A stop at Nye's Pharmacy meant a cherry coke, cheeseburger and french fries - maybe even an ice cream. For many Conway teenagers in the late 1960's, Sunday afternoon cruising always led to a meet-up at Nye's. Today, the pharmacy has new owners, Matt and Tiffany Combs, and they still proudly serve the city's families.  
Jerry Stevens recently posted on the Facebook page You’re Probably From Conway, SC if…: 
Looking for a Local Licensed, Bonded, and Insured Sign Company for Restoration Project of a Conway Icon. Must be in Writing and Reasonable...This Project is for the Citizens of Conway, Rivertown Beatification Project...If this one is Successful, More to follow...We all can do this for Our Town…Nye's Soda Fountain. Est. 1953.

What We Need 

  • We are raising funds to have a local sign company restore the sign.
  • They will sandblast it and repaint it to its original colors.
  • The restored sign will be re-installed on top of the Nye's Pharmacy building.
  • Once the sign is restored, we will investigate replacing the previous neon lighting with LED light strips and reinstalling the original light covers.

The Impact

Your contribution will make a difference in Conway.

  • Nye's Pharmacy is a local historic landmark. 
  • Constructed in 1953, the building is the city’s only example of modern architecture.
  • This restoration demonstrates that we care about preserving our community's history and the structures that tell its stories.

Other Ways You Can Help

Help us spread the word.

  • Please use the social media sharing tools to tell folks about our campaign to restore the Nye's Pharmacy Sign.

About our Organization

Conway Cultural Development Corporation leads community and economic development projects through arts, cultural and heritage strategies in order to preserve and sustain the local aesthetic character of Conway, South Carolina. 

The organization works in partnership with Create! Conway, a local membership arts organization. Conway Cultural Development Corporation (CCDC) is pursuing designation as a Community Development Corporation (CDC) and the organization is currently a sponsored project of Fractured Atlas, a 501(c)(3) public charity. 

Contributions to the Nye's Pharmacy Sign Restoration Project made through Fractured Atlas for the purposes of Conway Cultural Development Corporation are tax-deductible to the extent permitted by law. 

Donating by Check

If you are interested in donating to this project by check, please make your check payable to Fractured Atlas and then mail your check to:

Conway Cultural Development Corporation
209 Laurel St.
Conway, SC 29526

We will report your donation to Fractured Atlas and they will deposit the check. Once your donation is processed by Fractured Atlas, we will send you a tax receipt.

story:
Ինչ է իրենից ներկայացնում գաղափարը և ինչով է այն կարևոր:

Ջերմուկ քաղաքն Հայաստանի հայտնի զբոսաշրջային կենտրոններից մեկն է: Այստեղ տարեկան այցելում են 35 000 - 40 000 մարդ:
Ջերմուկում զբոսաշրջային ենթակառուցվածքները թույլ են զարգացած և այստեղ այցելող մարդիկ անընդհատ փնտրում են նոր հետաքրքրություններ: Ժայռամագլցման փակ դահլիճն ու բնական ժայռապատերն ամռանը, իսկ սառցամագլցումը ձմռանը կարող են ինչ որ չափով լցնել զբոսաշրջիկների առօրյան, միաժամանակ ապահովելով զբոսաշրջային լրացուցիչ հոսք դեպի Ջերմուկ: 
Սառցամագլցման ծառայությունն Հայաստանում նորություն է և ձմեռային տուրիզմը զարգացնելու նոր հնարավորություն է: Ձմռանը Ջերմուկում  քիչ զբոսաշրջիկների պատճառով հյուրանոցներն ազատ են արձակում իրենց աշխատողների 80%-ից ավելիին, իսկ դեկտեմբերից մինչև փետրվար ամիս դեպի Ջերմուկ սառցամագլցողների այցելությունը կխթանի նաև հյուրանոցային տուրիզմի զարգացմանը և կնպաստի աշխատատեղերի կայունությանը: 
Ծրագրի իրականացումից հետո կստեղծվի 4-6 կայուն աշխատատեղ:

Որքան գումար է մեզ հարկավոր:

Ծրագրի իրականացման համար անհրաժեշտ է 19 375 $, որից 4 375 $ արդեն ունենք:

  1. Բնական ժայռապատի կառուցում և գույք-հանդերձանք՝ 6 395 $,
  2. Սառցամագլցման ժայռապատի կառուցում՝ 3041 $,
  3. Արհեստական ժայռապատի կառուցում՝ 8 230 $,
  4. Տրանսպորտային և վարչական ծախսեր՝ 1709 $

Եթե մեր նախատեսած գումարը չկարողանանք հավաքել, պակասող մասը կլրացնենք վարկային միջոցների ներգրավմամբ:

Ինչպես կարող եք օգնել մեզ:

Եթե չեք պատրաստվում տոմս գնել կամ կատարել նվիրատվություն, ապա խնդրում եմ տարածել հղումը սոցիալական ցանցերում, պատմել ընկերներին և առաջարկել ունենալ իրենց ներդրումն այս գաղափարի իրականացման մեջ:

What itself the idea and how important it is?

Jermuk city is one of the touristic center in Armenia. Yearly 35000-40000 people are visiting Jermuk. The inner tourism infrastructures are not developed enough and the tourists are constantly looking for new interesting activities. Indoor rock climbing hall and the natural rocks in summer, ice climbing in winter can be the attractive engagement for the tourists and can open extra touristic destination to Jermuk.

Ice climbing is NEW in Armenia and a new chance to improve the winter tourism. Because of few tourists in winter, the hotels management fires more than 80% of their employees. So the visit of ice- climbers from December to February will enhance the hotel business and will support the constant employment in Jermuk. After fulfilling the project we will have 4-6 permanent employment.

How much money do we need?
For the project is needed 19.375$: 

1. A house in the complex of climbing wall and the tools-uniforms- 6395$ 

2. Construction of the wall for Ice climbing-3041$ 

3. Construction of the artificial climbing wall-8230$. 

4. Transportation and administrative expenses-1709$.

If the calculated amount is not completed we will involve as well the credits from the bank.

How you can help?

If you are not ready to buy a ticket or do some charity then, please share this in facebook of tell your friends to have some investment in this idea-project.

story:
The Future of Work


Every day we hear about the surge in people working from home, the local cafe or from co-working spaces that are springing up everywhere.

Despite its enormous popularity there is no single online #telework hub - not till now. 

Cue www.teleworktoday.net - a feature-rich website that delivers the latest legitimate telework jobs along with training, networking and news.

  • Telework Today is a site destined to be Australia's online Telework Hub
  • Our aim is to promote, inform & educate. We love Teleworking and want to open others' minds to the huge advantages of a remote workforce.
  • We want to see less traffic,  a reduction in travel time, a better work/life balance and increased productivity as our nation embraces the digital age.


The Pitch

We are raising funds to promote and develop the Telework Today website.

    • Our goal is to finance an advertising campaign promoting the merits of telecommuting and showing how perfectly suited it is for Australia.
    • Our objective is to promote telecommuting via ads on the back of buses in Australian capital cities and major regional hubs.  We will launch a series of punchy online ads drawing people to www.teleworktoday.net and highlight the advantages of 'steering clear of the office'.
    • In the past 12-months the Australian government has 'archived' its www.telework.gov.au website. There is currently no Australia-based online portal  for telecommuters. We think this void must be filled.
    • Campaign funds will be (approximately) split as follows - 40% public transport advertising campaign, 40% online and print media promotion and advertising and 20% web development and site administration.

The Impact

A few facts about commuting to work in Australia.

  • The average Australian worker spends over 1 hour a day commuting. This equates to almost 10 (wasted) days each year! 
  • Work in a capital city and this figure rises to 1.5hrs a day or 15 days a year!
  • Sydney commuters spend up to 4-days a year sitting in the car.
  • Motorist spends up to $20,000pa commuting to work. This includes registration, parking and petrol. Don't know about you but I'd rather take a luxury trip to Europe each year than pay that!
  • An average CBD worker spends up to $13,000pa on public transport - not to mention the wasted travel time.
  • Tuesday and Wednesday mornings are, on average, the worst for traffic.
  • Apart from the frustration faction, commuting can cause back pain, higher cholesterol, and higher levels of obesity. 
  • That said .....  Studies have shown teleworkers can be up to be 50% more productive, have far less stress in their lives, enjoy a better work/life balance and spend more time with family. Advantages for business & managers are - Cost savings, less office space needed, happier employees, retention of valued staff,  greater geographical availability of talent and many more bonuses.


Merits Of Remote Work

Noticed I'm a passionate Teleworker? After leaving the hustle 'n bustle of hectic newspaper newsrooms 2-years ago, I've never looked back. In this period, like many other telecommuters, I've found a huge increase in productivity. My work/life balance and quality of life to have soared to new heights. 

  • I've successfully teleworked for 2-years. This has included successfully editing a newspaper via remote log in and Skype, the team of journalists were 2000km way!
  • The way I see it, if a newspaper editor can telecommute just about any employee can!
  • With the latest communications, broadband & remote log in software many people are finding their own freedom to work from home. Scan the pages of the big job websites and you will see evidence of the ever-growing telework trend.


'Teleworks need support. They need daily chat, news advice and networking. They need Telework Today.'

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand not everyone will be able to financially assist with this campaign but there is something huge you could do for us ... It's free to share our passion for telework with others!  

  • In the meantime have a think about how you could work remotely and improve your own work/life balance. We guarantee you will love it.
  • Tell your friends about the advantages of telework and let them know about our great website www.teleworktoday.net
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools! They are alongside this post.

Thanks for reading and have a fantastic, productive & traffic-free day :-)
story_txt:
The Future of Work 




Every day we hear about the surge in people working from home, the local cafe or from co-working spaces that are springing up everywhere.

Despite its enormous popularity there is no single online #telework hub - not till now. 

Cue www.teleworktoday.net - a feature-rich website that delivers the latest legitimate telework jobs along with training, networking and news.

Telework Today is a site destined to be Australia's online Telework Hub Our aim is to promote, inform & educate. We love Teleworking and want to open others' minds to the huge advantages of a remote workforce. We want to see less traffic,  a reduction in travel time, a better work/life balance and increased productivity as our nation embraces the digital age.





   The Pitch We are raising funds to promote and develop the Telework Today website.


Our goal is to finance an advertising campaign promoting the merits of telecommuting and showing how perfectly suited it is for Australia.
Our objective is to promote telecommuting via ads on the back of buses in Australian capital cities and major regional hubs.  We will launch a series of punchy online ads drawing people to www.teleworktoday.net and highlight the advantages of 'steering clear of the office'.
In the past 12-months the Australian government has 'archived' its www.telework.gov.au website. There is currently no Australia-based online portal  for telecommuters. We think this void must be filled.
Campaign funds will be (approximately) split as follows - 40% public transport advertising campaign, 40% online and print media promotion and advertising and 20% web development and site administration.
 




   The Impact A few facts about commuting to work in Australia.  The average Australian worker spends over 1 hour a day commuting. This equates to almost 10 (wasted) days each year! 
Work in a capital city and this figure rises to 1.5hrs a day or 15 days a year!
Sydney commuters spend up to 4-days a year sitting in the car.
Motorist spends up to $20,000pa commuting to work. This includes registration, parking and petrol. Don't know about you but I'd rather take a luxury trip to Europe each year than pay that!
An average CBD worker spends up to $13,000pa on public transport - not to mention the wasted travel time.
Tuesday and Wednesday mornings are, on average, the worst for traffic.
Apart from the frustration faction, commuting can cause back pain, higher cholesterol, and higher levels of obesity. 


That said .....  Studies have shown teleworkers can be up to be 50% more productive, have far less stress in their lives, enjoy a better work/life balance and spend more time with family. Advantages for business & managers are - Cost savings, less office space needed, happier employees, retention of valued staff,  greater geographical availability of talent and many more bonuses.







Merits Of Remote Work
Noticed I'm a passionate Teleworker? After leaving the hustle 'n bustle of hectic newspaper newsrooms 2-years ago, I've never looked back. In this period, like many other telecommuters, I've found a huge increase in productivity. My work/life balance and quality of life to have soared to new heights.   I've successfully teleworked for 2-years. This has included successfully editing a newspaper via remote log in and Skype, the team of journalists were 2000km way! The way I see it, if a newspaper editor can telecommute just about any employee can!
With the latest communications, broadband & remote log in software many people are finding their own freedom to work from home. Scan the pages of the big job websites and you will see evidence of the ever-growing telework trend. 




'Teleworks need support. They need daily chat, news advice and networking. They need Telework Today.'   Other Ways You Can Help We understand not everyone will be able to financially assist with this campaign but there is something huge you could do for us ... It's free to share our passion for telework with others!    In the meantime have a think about how you could work remotely and improve your own work/life balance. We guarantee you will love it.
Tell your friends about the advantages of telework and let them know about our great website www.teleworktoday.net
 Use the Indiegogo share tools! They are alongside this post.   Thanks for reading and have a fantastic, productive & traffic-free day :-)

story:
I want to provide a perfect market place -an online store for Indian Women Entrepreneurs (Housewives,Senior Ladies)

Hi dear all,

Hope all are doing well in their lives!!

It's just two weeks I have joined the Women Entrepreneur group on one of the networking site and can see many budding women entrepreneurs marketing their products and with their creative ideas. I am planning to create an online store. In that online store all Indian Women can register and post their products and pricing .I am there to ensure that the products are promoted and I have a team of SEO's and promoters to promote the website.

Here in this group there are just 11,351 members currently and with the online store one can reach more customers in India and abroad too. I want to create an all Indian Women Entrepreneurs e-commerce website only.It would be created by an Indian Woman for Indian Women.

Most of the ladies are posting their products in a group on one of the social networking website.It gives them limited exposure. Creating their own website would be an expensive affair for the ladies. Hence I want to initiate this programe and create an online store.

Your donations or micro financing would definitely help me to fulfill the aim,mission and vision of many budding Indian Women Entrepreneurs.

Learn the story behind "INDIAN WOMAN ENTREPRENEURS" and help us meet our goal.

I would be obliged to you all who can contribute and spread the word further.


Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please  get the word out and make some noise about INDIAN WOMAN ENTREPRENEURS!
  • Please like us on FACEBOOK
  • Please tweet about us on TWITTER
  • SHARE, SHARE, SHARE!

story:
Children are in need...

Development Solutions, DBA Hope 4 Kids, is going to be sending a small group to a village in South Africa at the end of September 2015.  Huntington needs help, they have 168 children in dire need.  Hope 4 Kids will be helping to set up foster homes for these children in the hopes to prevent them from going into orphanges until their forever families can be found.

Your donation will provide these children in their new foster homes with food, shelter and clothing.  It will also provide the 168 children with medicine, mosquito nets and blankets that are currently a primary need in the village.

IF our goal of $15,000 is exceeded, the funding will go to sustain the foster homes and the children in them until permanent homes can be found, this will allow the children to remain out of orphanages and in a home environment.


About Us

Hope 4 Kids has been a successful licensed foster care and adoption agency in Southern California for over twenty years. WE hope to take our experience and expertise to South Africa (where currently only two American agencies are working) to help set up a foster care and adoption system so that the children that can, will remain in their own culture with their families they know and those that are not able to stay will find homes that can provide a safe and loving environment.


Check Out what Others are Saying about this Campaign

The Sun San Bernardino and the Inland Empire

The Daily Times

Fox 23 News

Sacramento Bee



Your Donation is Tax Deductible!

story:
I started decorating cakes for extra money, when my eldest son turned two. And my baby was just one.  I baked in my spare time in addition to working full time and going to Grayson College, to support my family. I am proud that I have been able to raise my two sons, who are now 19 & 20 and on their own, with my home bakery business.  Now is the time to realize my dream to take The Cookie Café to a new level, and in order to do that I need a commercial kitchen.  I have not had any luck with banks, as I do not need much money, and some banks, just won’t fund a food business. 

It has not always been easy, getting up early in the morning to bake for farmers’ markets, flea markets, and individual orders, but it has been worth it, as I have created a loyal customer base.  They love my decorated sugar cookies, cake balls, and fancy cakes.  It is my dream to have a real bakery business and I need help.  I am asking my family, friends and new friends to help fund my dream and to spread the sweet treats of The Cookie Café across the county, through an on-line business.  As a cottage food business, I cannot sell retail, or on-line, so I am in need of a commercial kitchen.  Your donations will help me with the following expenses.


  • Permits, licenses, insurance, and fees
  • Commercial kitchen space
  • Expanding distribution
  • Marketing and business development
  • Packaging and labeling along with testing
  • Equipment and bake ware
  • High quality ingredients

I do understand not everyone will be able to help monetarily, but everyone can help by spreading the word.


  • Like and share on Facebook
  • Follow and repost on instagram
  • Email our link to your family and friends
Your donations will insure that we can bring beautifully decorated baked goods to you. Please pass it along to anyone else with a love for beautiful and delicious sweet treats.

story:
Dear Friends of Solstice,

It is with great disappointment that we have had to discontinue the Solstice mural project.  A combination of lacking community support and funding both play a role is this decision.  The existing Living Walls mural will stay in tact for the time being.

We want you to know that we deeply appreciate your contribution to this effort.  Given the circumstances, we can either offer in-studio credit (towards classes and workshops) or refund you by check via mail.  If you chose a studio credit, please email us your name and the amount donated.  If a refund is preferred, please email us at info@solsticeatlanta.com with your name, address, and the amount owed.  Please note that refund processing may take up to 30 days.  We apologize for any inconvenience.

Sincerely,

Kristen Mercado, Owner
