We want to make a difference and you can help us by contributing to this crowd funding campaign. And the good thing is, you'll get your loan paid back in cheese. Get in contact with us if you need any more information. Liking us on the social media is very much appreciated as well.

story:
My name is  John OLoughlin

                                Inventor - Designer - Manufacturer 
I have a number of inventions, ready  for manufacture. All have IP protection in hand. The company   Starpan Pty Ltd . Business is, Invention  Innovation  Design
Manufacture. Some of our  invention are in the field of ,Bush Fire Crew Safety
Technology - Waste Management Conservation .And mass market products.
We are ready to go to manufacture ,with two of our inventions. The products are for
the mass market ,and will help fund, and bring our other innovations on to 
manufacture and distribution. Two of the invention that are ready for manufacture
are the starpan  TM  and The  egg cracker device .To view the products  go to.
www.starpan.com.au     
The funding I need  would  be for tooling,  packaging  and distribution for stage one.
Your contribution would get the ball rolling. The  starpan is press molded and the egg cracker is  injection molded. The  tooling  costs are high.
The products have a mass  market in  the US and Europe . Our products will help a lot of people who find it hard to do some things that we find easy to do.
I can be contacted by email at     starpan@live.com.au   
Starpan Pty Ltd
Kind  Regards
John  OLoughlin   Inventor

story:
Campaign

The purpose of our campaign is to raise funds for the global marketing of the idea of LAHA, the goals of which are to spread philanthropic democracy and the concept of donor-conscious purchasing in the world. We have already built the system, it works. We would like the idea to spread so people would chose LAHA as the tool to make the connection between charity fundraising and corporate social responsibility. As a result of this, nonprofits will not have to constantly beg for money or lobby for government grants.

The Love All Help All (LAHA) Foundation is a new and exciting platform for what we call the socially responsible citizen.

Quintessentially a product of the digital revolution, LAHA allows us to put aside the old political ideas of Right and Left, as well as the notion that only the state, big corporations or high net worth individuals have a significant role to play in designing the social architecture of our world, while the citizens are left to just pay their taxes and put pennies in a collection box.

LAHA inaugurates a power-shift in favour of the citizen who, as part of a global community, can effect enormous change simply through his or her online purchases.

In a nutshell, it works like this. You buy something online, either through vendors listed on our website or via the LAHA link on a company's own website. A percentage of whatever you purchase is paid by the company to any not-for-profit of your choice.

This could be anything from your local school or swimming club to one of the major charities such as Oxfam or Christian Aid. No-one but you makes that choice. And you don't pay a penny.

All that is required from you is to take the minimal time and effort to make a difference.

And imagine what a difference you could make. According to a study quoted by Britain's Centre for Retail Research, online sales in the UK are forecast to reach £52 billion ($77 billion) in 2015. In the United States, the figure is expected to be $350 billion.

Yearly growth rates for the coming years are forecast at 15-20%. Across the world billions are being spent online every single day.By donating even a small fraction of that to a cause you believe in and want to support, you and the wider LAHA community will truly make a difference.

Whatever your age, if you buy things online you can get involved right now. But we are particularly keen to implant the donor-conscious mentality into the next generation. Set an example to your children. Show them that they no longer need to be passive observers on the sidelines. The future belongs to those who have the imagination to understand that we, the donor conscious citizens, are empowered as never before.

You'll be amazed how easy it is.

Two quick questions before you get started:

What is in it for us at LAHA?

Believe it or not, we just want to do a good thing. Unlike some other platforms offering a similar method of donation via online purchasing, we do not take a cut either from you or the vendor. Our primary aim is to build a community.

To be clear, 100% of what you donate goes to the good cause that you have chosen to support. That's it!

Why should the companies participate?

Companies are also run by people. They too feel good about effecting change. If you're of a more cynical disposition, you might simply conclude that they'll do it because it is fantastically good for their image. In the end, who cares why they want to get involved, just so long as they do.

And all the available research shows that companies are queuing up to become what we call Angel Hands.

When you see a participating company (an Angel Hand) on our website or our click-on LAHA logo on theirs, you'll know that you're seeing a business that will help you make donating to good causes a cost-free part of your daily life.

Join the LAHA community now

So let's get started. Help us build a genuinely philanthropic democracy, where you, not some remote billionaire, are the philanthropist. And remember, it won't cost you anything at all.

You just need the imagination and the generosity of heart to start making a difference. Click here to see a short video demonstration, or click here to get started right now. For more information about LAHA.

https://loveallhelpall.org/

story:
Who are we?

Between the wild wind and the babbling brook is where our little farm is stood.

It started with a dream to become more self sufficient and to live closer to the land. To grow our own food and to have a gentler footprint on the earth. It has since become so much more than the dream of self sufficiency. It has become a realisation that we are connected to our food in a way that todays world has almost lost sight of, and an awareness of how we are connected to our planet, and how we can benefit nature through raising animals in an ethical and sustainable way that complements nature and its resources. 

Here at Windbrook Farm we have a small milking herd of Jämtland goats, a native Swedish breed which is at risk of endangerment. Our goats are fed on pasture and ecological grain, we have Linderöd pigs, another native Swedish breed, also an endangered breed. Our pigs live free range in the forest, and have several hectares of grazing forest to roam. We also raise a growing flock of hens for both meat and eggs. We keep a variety of hens, Hedemora, Orpington crosses, Brahmas and a couple of other cross breeds. 

We have built up the farm over the past four years, and invested our own time, energy and money into making it what it is today. We use sustainable practices, encourage biodiversity, and actively choose to work with techniques such as Holistic Management, Permaculture, and Regenerative Agriculture.


The Plan

Now we have begun the next chapter in our journey, we decided that we wanted to move from a small family farm, supplying our own needs to opening our farm to the community and selling our products locally. We are expanding our little farm so it includes a farm shop where we can sell our own products and products from farms near by.

Late last spring, we were taking the dog for a walk in our village, and walked a different way than usual, it was then that we came upon a worn down old house, standing quietly set back from the road. where once it would have stood proudly in the centre of the village. Walking up to the dusty window to look in, inside it was a time capsule of days gone by. There, this once grand building has stood, unloved and untouched for 40 years. We decided right then, we wanted to breathe life back into this old country store, and bought it straight away.

Here we will build a production kitchen, a micro dairy and farm shop. As well as this, we are converting the old hay loft into a new chicken house, and refitting the old stable block into a open plan goat stable, with a goat playground outside for baby goats. We are also renovating the old baking house into a guest house for farm visitors to come and stay.


Why we need your help

At Windbrook Farm, we believe strongly in community, that it is community that strengthens and unites us. We have a dream to open our shop, so we can benefit our community, offer people good local food, strengthen bonds and friendships, strengthen the local economy and lead a full, positive life whilst doing so. To help make that possible we must first renovate the entire building and make it usable.

 We have the drive, the passion, the dream and the energy. We are asking for your help to be able to fund the renovation costs of the farm shop building and animal stables, to help make this project a reality and bring life once again to the country store.

How the funds raised will be used

  • Conversion of the old hay barn into a chicken house
  • Replacing the leaking roof and fixing the water damage
  • Fitting an approved production kitchen
  • Starting work on the micro dairy and milking barn
  • Renovating the stable block
  • Poultry equipment
  • Reconnecting services, such as electricity 
If we are not successful in reaching our target, all the funds contributed will still go towards these projects and getting them as close to completion as possible.

Risks & Challenges

Living in an area with foxes, hawks and lynx, keeping free range chickens can always pose as a risk, luckily we have 2 livestock guardian dogs who keep that risk low. Other factors that can be a challenge are the short summers and long winters we get. External building can be difficult when its very cold and deep snow outside, however there is plenty of work inside and with the animals for us to do during this time.

Other Ways You Can Help

You can also help us by sharing this page to help us reach our goal, and letting people know about this campaign.

You can follow and share our Facebook and Instagram pages and keep up to date on our projects

Thankyou for your support!


More about the Animals

The Goats

Just now we have 4 beautiful goats in our herd, we are going to increase our goat family to 10 milk goats, plus babies once they have a new home to move into. They will have the freedom to free range in the forest, and have a good happy life exploring all day long. The goats have a totally organic and local diet of hay grown on our own land, free grazing in the forest and supplemented with organic grain, grown in a neighbouring village.


The chickens

We currently have 10 chickens on the farm, all for egg production. This year we are growing our chicken flock to 50 laying hens and 100+ meat birds. They will have full access to the land to scratch up and help rejuvenate the soil, they will also have full access to the forest, and allowed to live as natural of a life as possible. 


The Pigs

The pigs live a happy free range life in the forest, they have a very natural life, how pigs should live, free of confinement. They spend their days foraging, sleeping and playing. They help the forest to stay healthy whilst being happy and healthy themselves. Life is stress free. Happy pigs provide us with good happy meat. We have three breeding sows, and expecting our first litter of piglets very soon. 

All of our animals have a happy life, with no soy, no GMOs and antibiotic free.
story_txt:
Who are we?
Between the wild wind and the babbling brook is where our little farm is stood.
It started with a dream to become more self sufficient and to live closer to the land. To grow our own food and to have a gentler footprint on the earth. It has since become so much more than the dream of self sufficiency. It has become a realisation that we are connected to our food in a way that todays world has almost lost sight of, and an awareness of how we are connected to our planet, and how we can benefit nature through raising animals in an ethical and sustainable way that complements nature and its resources. 
Here at Windbrook Farm we have a small milking herd of Jämtland goats, a native Swedish breed which is at risk of endangerment. Our goats are fed on pasture and ecological grain, we have Linderöd pigs, another native Swedish breed, also an endangered breed. Our pigs live free range in the forest, and have several hectares of grazing forest to roam. We also raise a growing flock of hens for both meat and eggs. We keep a variety of hens, Hedemora, Orpington crosses, Brahmas and a couple of other cross breeds. 
We have built up the farm over the past four years, and invested our own time, energy and money into making it what it is today. We use sustainable practices, encourage biodiversity, and actively choose to work with techniques such as Holistic Management, Permaculture, and Regenerative Agriculture.

   
The Plan
Now we have begun the next chapter in our journey, we decided that we wanted to move from a small family farm, supplying our own needs to opening our farm to the community and selling our products locally. We are expanding our little farm so it includes a farm shop where we can sell our own products and products from farms near by.
Late last spring, we were taking the dog for a walk in our village, and walked a different way than usual, it was then that we came upon a worn down old house, standing quietly set back from the road. where once it would have stood proudly in the centre of the village. Walking up to the dusty window to look in, inside it was a time capsule of days gone by. There, this once grand building has stood, unloved and untouched for 40 years. We decided right then, we wanted to breathe life back into this old country store, and bought it straight away.


Here we will build a production kitchen, a micro dairy and farm shop. As well as this, we are converting the old hay loft into a new chicken house, and refitting the old stable block into a open plan goat stable, with a goat playground outside for baby goats. We are also renovating the old baking house into a guest house for farm visitors to come and stay.

    Why we need your help 

At Windbrook Farm, we believe strongly in community, that it is community that strengthens and unites us. We have a dream to open our shop, so we can benefit our community, offer people good local food, strengthen bonds and friendships, strengthen the local economy and lead a full, positive life whilst doing so. To help make that possible we must first renovate the entire building and make it usable.
 We have the drive, the passion, the dream and the energy. We are asking for your help to be able to fund the renovation costs of the farm shop building and animal stables, to help make this project a reality and bring life once again to the country store.

How the funds raised will be used

Conversion of the old hay barn into a chicken house
Replacing the leaking roof and fixing the water damage
Fitting an approved production kitchen
Starting work on the micro dairy and milking barn
Renovating the stable block
Poultry equipment
Reconnecting services, such as electricity 
If we are not successful in reaching our target, all the funds contributed will still go towards these projects and getting them as close to completion as possible.    Risks & Challenges Living in an area with foxes, hawks and lynx, keeping free range chickens can always pose as a risk, luckily we have 2 livestock guardian dogs who keep that risk low. Other factors that can be a challenge are the short summers and long winters we get. External building can be difficult when its very cold and deep snow outside, however there is plenty of work inside and with the animals for us to do during this time.
    Other Ways You Can Help 
You can also help us by sharing this page to help us reach our goal, and letting people know about this campaign.
You can follow and share our Facebook and Instagram pages and keep up to date on our projectsThankyou for your support!



More about the Animals
The Goats
Just now we have 4 beautiful goats in our herd, we are going to increase our goat family to 10 milk goats, plus babies once they have a new home to move into. They will have the freedom to free range in the forest, and have a good happy life exploring all day long. The goats have a totally organic and local diet of hay grown on our own land, free grazing in the forest and supplemented with organic grain, grown in a neighbouring village.

The chickens
We currently have 10 chickens on the farm, all for egg production. This year we are growing our chicken flock to 50 laying hens and 100+ meat birds. They will have full access to the land to scratch up and help rejuvenate the soil, they will also have full access to the forest, and allowed to live as natural of a life as possible. 

The Pigs
The pigs live a happy free range life in the forest, they have a very natural life, how pigs should live, free of confinement. They spend their days foraging, sleeping and playing. They help the forest to stay healthy whilst being happy and healthy themselves. Life is stress free. Happy pigs provide us with good happy meat. We have three breeding sows, and expecting our first litter of piglets very soon. 

All of our animals have a happy life, with no soy, no GMOs and antibiotic free.

story:
My name is Brian Sommer, and I’m here because I need your help to start up a new business called CluedIn Escape Rooms. CluedIn will be the next generation of escape rooms in the Chicago area. Escape rooms are a live action game where a group of 6-8 people go into a room and have an hour to solve a series of puzzles, riddles, and games to try and “escape” from the room. It’s an idea that started in Japan in 2007, and has swept across Asia and Europe. We’re just starting to see them here in the United States. If you want a small taste of what to expect, check out our video for a short demonstration. Escape rooms are great for adults and teens, couples, families, corporate team building and more. It’s an experience like no other, and the best hour you’ll spend!

Why me?

 I first discovered escape rooms about a year ago, and have done a number of them in the area. I also worked at an escape room where I learned the secrets behind the business. Combine that with the 7 years experience in management and I have the tools needed to create a successful business and improve on what exists. At my current job I’ve been in charge of marketing, social media, customer service, budgeting, payroll, and more. Everything needed to run a business. With my lifelong love of gaming and creative edge, I can design and implement the puzzles and games in the rooms themselves.

Why back us?

In addition to supporting a new local small business, you’ll get an entry to the most fun event you’ve experienced!

For every $20 you donate you’ll get one entry to our escape rooms when they open. (Normally we’ll be charging $28.50)

$120 will get you a full room to yourself for six people.

$250 will get you two full rooms of six people, plus your name on our “wall of founders” on our webpage and at CluedIn.

$500 gets you four full rooms of six people plus we’ll integrate a picture of you or your name into one of the puzzles in our rooms.

Want to invest more? For people interested in investing $1000 or more send me a message and I’ll go over how you can see a return on your investment from 5%-9% of your initial investment within a year. Plus you’ll receive more benefits as a premier backer.

What makes us different from other escape rooms?

We’ll be opening with two rooms (trust me, once you do it once you’ll want to do it again!). We’ll be adding on a third room after 4 months, and a fourth room after 8 months.
We’ll feature three types of rooms.
Story rooms- Where the puzzles tell a narrative
Theme rooms- Where the puzzles all relate to a fun theme
Challenge rooms- The puzzles will be random or skill based, and players compete on a leader board to win prizes every 4 months.
Our rooms will feature fun themes, nothing scary (except maybe around Halloween), and will be challenging, but never impossible to complete.


Opening a business is not without its own challenges. We currently have a few locations in mind, but nothing has been chosen yet. We look to be located in the Western or Southwest suburbs. With other escape rooms opening up in the area, I want to start out properly with 2 rooms, a professional website, the right location, and rooms built that are as much fun to look at as they are to play. We need as much money as possible to compete in this growing market. I am seeking out many other means to gain capital, but your help is greatly appreciated.

I appreciate your help, and feel free to send any questions to me at sommermassage@gmail.com

story:
• In Egmond-Binnen wordt een nieuw jongerencentrum (JOEB) gebouwd. Het wordt een aanbouw van Dorpshuis De Schulp. De gemeenteraad stemde eerder in met de nieuwbouw van het jongerencentrum. Het huidige pand verkeert in slechte staat en nieuwbouw op de huidige plek is niet mogelijk. In het nieuwe gebouw komt een multifunctionele zaal van ruim tachtig vierkante meter met een podium. Rondom de grote zaal komen de andere ruimtes, zoals kleinere zalen, een bar en opslagruimte. Om geluidslast te voorkomen zijn geluidwerende voorzieningen opgenomen in het ontwerp.

  • Leden van JOEB en mensen van Stichting Welzijn Bergen gaan zelf zorgen voor de afwerking van de binnenkant van het gebouw. Dit doen zij met vrijwilligers en met hulp van sponsorgeld.

  • De bouw is al van start gegaan en word in juli opgeleverd.

  • We staan nu alleen nog voor de uitdaging geld op te halen voor een mooie inrichting. wat we bijvoorbeeld nog nodig hebben is een podium, keuken, bar en de muren moeten nog afgewerkt.

  • Dat kan met uw hulp! Draagt u de jeugd van Egmond binnen een warm hart toe? dan kunt u doneren.
story_txt:
In Egmond-Binnen wordt een nieuw jongerencentrum (JOEB) gebouwd. Het wordt een aanbouw van Dorpshuis De Schulp. De gemeenteraad stemde eerder in met de nieuwbouw van het jongerencentrum. Het huidige pand verkeert in slechte staat en nieuwbouw op de huidige plek is niet mogelijk. In het nieuwe gebouw komt een multifunctionele zaal van ruim tachtig vierkante meter met een podium. Rondom de grote zaal komen de andere ruimtes, zoals kleinere zalen, een bar en opslagruimte. Om geluidslast te voorkomen zijn geluidwerende voorzieningen opgenomen in het ontwerp.
Leden van JOEB en mensen van Stichting Welzijn Bergen gaan zelf zorgen voor de afwerking van de binnenkant van het gebouw. Dit doen zij met vrijwilligers en met hulp van sponsorgeld.
De bouw is al van start gegaan en word in juli opgeleverd.
We staan nu alleen nog voor de uitdaging geld op te halen voor een mooie inrichting. wat we bijvoorbeeld nog nodig hebben is een podium, keuken, bar en de muren moeten nog afgewerkt.

Dat kan met uw hulp! Draagt u de jeugd van Egmond binnen een warm hart toe? dan kunt u doneren.

story:
Celebrating and Supporting Inclusion and Dignity: 100% Compliance with Austin's Restroom Signage Ordinance 

The Law
In 2014 Austin joined Philadelphia and Washington D.C. in becoming the third U.S. city to adopt regulations requiring all businesses to install gender-nonspecific signs for single user public restrooms, including restrooms accessible only to employees. 

Under the new regulations, all existing businesses are required to replace their current gender-specific signs with gender-nonspecific signs. The type, size, and design of the new signs are the responsibility of the business owner. These requirements also apply to remodels and new construction.

The Challenge in Austin
Despite these regulations (Ordinance No. 20141211-211), which went on the books as of December 2014, most businesses in Austin have yet to re-label their single-stall restrooms and become compliant - and most of those who have not yet complied don't yet know it's required (and punishable by a fine!).

The Goal for Austin
The Censored2Celebrated team has publicly committed to ensuring 100% signage compliance in all single-stall restrooms across every one of Austin's 42,000 businesses by November 16, 2016 - just in time for the Transgender Day of Remembrance/Transgender Day of Resilience 2016. 

To do this within the given time-frame we need to cover the cost of a small staff to manage the project and its volunteers, print promotional materials, provide signs for small and nonprofit businesses where purchasing and installing signs would create a financial hardship, and all the other expenses related to such a large initiative. 

Our goal for the entire 12 months of costs is just $84,000, and equates to only $2 per business. (How many businesses will you choose to support?)

Who Does This Affect
Gender nonspecific restrooms mean that parents can assist their children across the gender spectrum in the same restroom without worrying about reactions from others. It means a father needing to change the diaper of his newborn on a changing table can do so. It means a person with a disability needing support from a caregiver of a different gender can have the privacy they need. And it means every person of any gender identity (including gender neutral, gender nonconforming, or transgender), and anyone with a nonconforming gender expression can pee in peace.

We Believe
We believe that everyone deserves the same basic human dignities, which include respect and privacy. We also believe everyone deserves the right to feel included.

At its most basic level, this means we MUST offer equal dignity, respect, and privacy when it comes to using restrooms in public and commercial establishments.

Public signage changes behavior, and shapes social norms. (Just look at the power of No Smoking signs in shaping America's smoking habits, or how "Colored" versus "White" signs enforced separate and unequal Jim Crow laws.)

If we change the signs, we change the world.

Imagine along with our CEO & Founder, Melita Noël Cantú, MA, as she presented at the Austin Transgender Day of Remembrance 2015 event on November 21, 2015.

"Imagine for a moment if someone had created safe space for you to feel celebrated. Not just accepted, BUT celebrated?

Imagine if you now choose to consciously create safe space for another person in your life who deeply needs to explore their authentic selves. 

What would that look like? How could this one act of quiet celebration change someone's life?"

Signage can be such an act of quiet celebration - at an individual, and cultural, level.

Will you help?
Your donation of $4 - equaling 2 businesses sponsored - will make it possible for us to ensure that Austin is in compliance within one year - just in time to celebrate the good news at next year's Transgender Day of Remembrance event. 

We commit to going above and beyond to ensure 100% compliance at Austin's 42,000 businesses, and collaborating with stakeholders nationally, to create safety through restroom signage for all throughout the USA.

story:
What is Lateral Menus?

Lateral Menus is a mobile view of eatery menus that gives you the power to 

  • See the most current menus wherever you are
  • Search for the food you want in the locations you want
  • Purchase your meal using the app
  • Select your meal for delivery or book a table
  • Snap up incredible, discounted specials
  • Share your experience with other users and on social media

Lateral Menus helps you plan and enjoy your eating out or ordering in experiences more than ever before!
Hungry?

The Lateral Menus mobile app will be developed

Lateral Menus is part of a broader Lateral Solutions Mobile Suite that will revolutionize education, the way people track lists, purchase products and services, book accommodation, plan their home cooked meals and, of course, plan and enjoy their meals out or meals delivered in.  Lateral Menus currently offers an eatery a managed, mobile friendly (but not mobile app), online menu, try it out on your PC at http://lateral.solutions/Menus.  The Lateral Menus mobile application is our next, inevitable, step, but we would like your help to give it wings.

  • Focused Development: Lateral Menus and the Lateral Solutions Mobile Suite is currently not the core business of Lateral Solutions, we'd like that to change. While working on one of our passions, Lateral Menus, which is still in its infancy, there is the opportunity cost of lost income by not working on our corporate client projects.  We would like your support to be able to buckle down and bring the Lateral Menus mobile app to market ASAP.
  • Better Infrastructure: Simply put, the bigger our cloud servers the faster and better the experience for you, the user.  We currently have all of our cloud servers sitting in South Africa.  Having servers in the U.S., Europe, and elsewhere, would also radically improve the online experience in those locations.
  • Faster Market Saturation: Our plan is to have every eatery plugged into the Lateral Menus Module so that a user will have the most comprehensive and flexible experience in planning their meal.  We're going to focus our efforts in the locations of our supporters because we want you to be the first to benefit.
  • Market Connectivity: The Lateral Solutions Mobile Suite is being designed to have connected modules and connected users.  We want to create a single, powerful portal for users to meaningfully interact with, and connect to, the environment around them, on every level.

How will Lateral Menus change the world?

Not only will it be a module that will be part of a suite of interconnected, powerful, mobile lifestyle tools but we hope that Lateral Menus will stand out from similar products because of these features:

  • Stunning: A vibrant, quick and functional interface.
  • Specials: Crazy specials that can be set up by eateries, e.g. 50 Beef Burgers at 40% off the normal price; a user can purchase the special, pay, and book a table, leaving 49 specials available to other users.
  • Compare: Search and compare pricing, images and ratings of similar meals in defined locations.

Our biggest risks & challenges

Lateral Solutions is a young and successful software development company.  Our location, in the small city of Port Elizabeth on the beautiful southern coast of Africa, has always made building a skilled and easily expandable team of software developers an interesting challenge.  Juggling our passion for the Lateral Solutions Mobile Suite and our bespoke client projects also continues to be another challenge.  How have we managed our biggest business risks, and ultimately the biggest risks to the Lateral Solutions Mobile Suite and, specifically, the Lateral Menus Module?

  • Online Processes: Our focus of building Lateral Solutions to be a global player resulted in us ensuring that all of our processes were clearly defined and all phases of our project developments are online and can be performed remotely. Our relatively small team of six developers currently often work from different locations and we have enabled our goal which is to have a much larger development team working from various locations globally.
  • Opportunity: Our focus on processes and our passion to create powerful, in-house solutions resulted in us choosing to have all of our project management handled by our own constantly expanding and refined Lateral Lists online site, another of the soon to be developed Lateral Solutions Mobile Suite modules, which is currently available at http://lateral.solutions/Lists.

Please spread the word!

Ultimate we want our Lateral Solutions products to touch the life of each person who has a mobile device, please help us to build the momentum:

  • Use the social media power you have to direct people to this project.
  • Talk about Lateral Menus and what it will bring to the mobile world.
  • Like our Facebook page https://www.facebook.com/lateralsolutionsit/
  • Remember, like every other project, Lateral Menus is nothing without you, please support us and help us to put the power of Lateral Menus into your hands.

We look forward to positively influencing your world! :)

Opportunity: Our focus on processes and our passion to create powerful, in-house solutions resulted in us choosing to have all of our project management handled by our own constantly expanding and refined Lateral Lists online site, another of the soon to be developed Lateral Solutions Mobile Suite modules, which is currently available at http://lateral.solutions/Lists.    Please spread the word! Ultimate we want our Lateral Solutions products to touch the life of each person who has a mobile device, please help us to build the momentum:  Use the social media power you have to direct people to this project. Talk about Lateral Menus and what it will bring to the mobile world.
Like our Facebook page https://www.facebook.com/lateralsolutionsit/

Remember, like every other project, Lateral Menus is nothing without you, please support us and help us to put the power of Lateral Menus into your hands.   We look forward to positively influencing your world! :)

story:
Hi All,


I was recently accepted into the IDEX Fellowship program and will be moving to India for six months! If you’re interested in learning more about the work I’ll be doing *and potentially supporting my efforts* please read on!

ABOUT THE FELLOWSHIP:

The IDEX fellowship is a 6-month program that offers professional, cultural and social immersion for talented individuals interested in launching careers in the social enterprise sector.

IDEX places fellows, like me, alongside local entrepreneurs in homegrown enterprises. Currently IDEX operates in Bangalore, Mumbai, and Hyderabad, India. The main benefits of IDEX are two fold. Fellows have the benefit of working with mentors and enterprises that will grow them into diversely experienced and rounded professionals. Meanwhile, local IDEX partners receive the benefit of having vetted professionals committed to social enterprise working for their organizations for free: Professional Development for Human Capital.

What I find most compelling about IDEX is its work with local partners. These are Solutions created by Indians for Indians. The work we will pursue addresses problems as seen and felt by those actually living in Indian society.

MY PLACEMENT:

I will be working for women’s empowerment and gender equality. My placement organization is Shenomics. Shenomics is a success and leadership coaching platform for professional women. We will be helping women build a success toolkit to thrive in their careers and their lives.

Learn more about Shenomics here: http://shenomics.com/

To read more about the IDEX fellowship please see here:http://www.idexfellows.com/

MY STORY:

I am Bangladeshi American. Having visited Bangladesh many times while growing up, I was exposed to realities very different from my own day-to-day life. The juxtaposition between my life in the states and the lives of my counterparts in Bangladesh instilled in me a strong sense of gratitude and debt. I grew up knowing that with my privilege and opportunity, I owed it to future generations to create a better and more just world. This sense of purpose has been the driving factor for most of my life choices. 

I graduated from Boston University with a B.A. in International Relations and a minor in Business.  During my studies I was also able to complete courses abroad in London, England and Geneva, Switzerland. As a student I was heavily involved in campus life and held several leadership roles within my student organizations - for which I received the “Scarlet Key” award, Boston University’s highest non-academic honor.

Since graduating, I have been living and working in Boston as an Immigration Paralegal. While I deeply enjoy my work, there has been something missing. This is an opportunity for me to be BOLD. The IDEX fellowship will allow me to challenge myself, grow as a socially minded professional, but most importantly DO GOOD.

IDEX and my work with Shenomics will allow me to develop the skills I need to make the kind of change I want to see at home in U.S. and in Bangladesh. IDEX embodies my strongest held beliefs and provides an ideal platform for me to create tangible change.  I believe my work experience, leadership qualities, and positive attitude make me someone worth sponsoring.

HOW YOU CAN HELP:

The fellowship provides a monthly stipend that affords group housing and a modest lifestyle akin to that of the locals in my community. I am responsible for health insurance, immunizations, tuition, and airfare.

I am asking for support to help offset the costs of my tuition, health insurance, immunizations, and flight. Every small bit helps!

Moved to contribute but can't donate? Here are other ways to take action:

Share this page with friends, family, classmates, colleagues, etc. In doing so, you will expand my network and increase my chance to get funded.

Share knowledge and insight relevant to the fellowship: Bangalore, India, strategy and innovation, social entrepreneurship, education, community development, and so on.

Refer me to contacts with expertise on the above—in India, the U.S., or elsewhere.

Love! Whether you send me life updates, memes, or positive vibes and well wishes I really appreciate it – while I’m here and also very far from home!

story:
Short Summary

Tried and True Contractors is a new disabled veteran-owned sewer and water contracting company located in Milwaukee, Wisconsin and is owned by Thomas A. Barkovich, United States Marine.  

We are asking the American people for a loan to start operating our business.  The money you donate will help us start hiring vets and giving back to our community. Beginning in 2017, we will start giving back every dollar you donate to charities supporting veterans.


What We Need & What You Get

We are asking for $1.5 million dollars.  We know that's a lot of money--equipment, supplies, salaries for our employees, insurance, and bonding--it takes a lot to start a construction business.  

Every dollar you donate will go to a general fund for local veteran organizations including the American Legion, American Legion Riders, Pits and Patriots, and other organizations we support.  This fund will be divided evenly among these worthy organizations.

Our Donation Board will be continually updated through the campaign with your comments and a running tally of contributions for each organization.  


The Impact

You are helping a veteran owned company grow and giving us an opportunity to support veterans in our community.  As our business grows, we will hire veterans, provide good jobs, and offer opportunities for personal growth within the construction industry.  


Risks & Challenges

This sounds crazy, right?  Why should you trust us to live up to our promises? Here's the thing:  we don't need your donations.  We are asking you to be part of something special.  Your donation does help Tried and True, but more importantly it will contribute in full to charitable organizations that you choose!  We will use your donations to fund day to day operations in 2016.  Starting in 2017, we will begin to donate your contributions to charitable organizations who need our help, support, and recognition.

Thomas has been supporting his community with the American Legion and the Legion Riders, donating his time and construction skills to Blue Lotus Farm and Kayla's Krew for disabled adults and children, helping feed the Hungry through Empty Bowls, supporting education through the Future Cities competition, and helping families in need with Christmas on Campus at Milwaukee School of Engineering.  

Tried and True is committed to giving back, and we want you to help us be a force for good and positivity here in Wisconsin.


Other Ways You Can Help

Donations are not the only way to help.  GETTING THE WORD OUT is just as important!  PLEASE SHARE OUR CAMPAIGN with your friends and family--tell them about what we are doing and encourage them to VISIT OUR INDIEGOGO SITE.  Please feel free to CONTACT US ON OUR FACEBOOK PAGE: Tried and True Contractors.  We would love to tell you more about ourselves and our plans for the future!

story:
Table of contents

1. Introduction

2. What kind of Rain Power research will this campaign fund?

3. What is Kinetic Energy& has it been used to generate power?

4. WEDO TECHNOLOGY ENERGY VISION FOR FUTURE GENERATIONS

5. Conclusion

6. UPDATE 1: UNLIMITED NATURAL SUSTIANABLE ENERGY MOTION THEORY:12/27/15

1. Introduction

Behold the wonders of a not so distant future. Take a slow deep breath and close your eyes. Imagine our future. Behold all the exciting new opportunities available to you and your family. Look at how far you have come, look at how far we have come as a species. Man, isn’t it funny how your kids look just as you did when you were younger. Marvel at you and your family enjoying a great day out doors, drinking fresh clean water, breathing fresh clean air. We did it! Humanity has finally wakened up and recognized that with efficiency and creativity, we can easily solve the prehistoric energy problems of previous generations. Wait! What’s that? On the surface of that structure; are you kidding me? Can you see it?I know, I know, I can’t believe it either but yes it’s here. Yes, dare I say it????

RAIN POWER IS HERE!

Imagine if every rain shower could generate a useable about of green energy. Imagine if humanity could start using just one of the many unlimited natural god given resources in our great planet to generate a useable amount of power. WE CAN NOW!

I CHALLENGE all of you with the capacity, to imagine a future with unlimited clean green energy derived from every natural accruing rain shower!!!

Would that help our global energy needs???

2. What kind of Rain Power research will this campaign fund?

WEDO TECHNOLOGY is seeking funding for rain power (kinetic) energy research. We believe we can have a fully operational system within the next 18-36 months. Much of the needed technologies for this process already exist, nevertheless no visionary has derived a system to start this process. Humanity’s never ending quest for unlimited sustainable energy solutions leads our spices in many exciting new directions. This seemingly never ending quest for energy has overtaken our hunger for knowledge, innovation, & unity. We’ve lost our imagination and will to take our species & planet in exciting new directions. Many creative minds settle for the visions of pervious innovators instead of craving their own paths. We want to change this narrative.

For years I've independently research energy derived from rain power. I believe the kinetic energy from rain drops along with the current produced from the liquid could create productive amounts of green natural energy. Living in Florida has allowed me to test my theory preliminary but now is the time for this groundbreaking great green solution to take it to the next level. I want to start from starch. Although I know I have great ideas and systems already, with the right funding and a fresh start I believe I can create several productive prototypes.

Each rain drop creates energy as it ascends from the sky. In every rain storm billions if not trillions of energy droplets fall to the ground. Each time one of these energy droplets hit the surface it creates measurable kinetic energy from the impact. Imagine when we designed surfaces that generated energy based off kinetic energy derived from rain drops. These system would benefit some areas more than most, but these systems will add to our planets overall energy portfolio and help to reduce the need for unsustainable energy solutions. We need more creative plans for action if were truly seeking results.

3. What is Kinetic Energy & has it been used to generate power?

Kinetic Energy is?

ki·net·ic en·er·gy

[kəˈnedik ˈenərjē]

NOUN

1.physics

Energy that a body possesses by virtue of being in motion

Powered by Oxford Dictionaries · © Oxford University Press

There are five forms of kinetic energy- All of our current energy is derived from these 5 sources.

1.Light

2.Heat

3.Sound

4.Motion

5.Radiation

Note we currently generate useable power from all the above sources accept sound. Rain power is correlated with motion. The energy I intend to harness is kinetic Rain motion energy.

Has Kinetic Energy ever been used to generate useful electrical power?

Yes!

In the London Olympics a walk way was designed to generate kinetic (motion) electrical power from the footsteps of stadium travelers; to power cellphone power stations and street light. These kind of creative solutions are what’s need to fully diversify our energy portfolio.

If usable energy could be derived from footsteps in the London Olympics, then why wouldn't rain energy provide enough useful kinetic (motion) energy?

WE BELIEVE IT WILL!

4. WEDO TECHNOLOGY ENERGY VISION FOR FUTURE GENERATIONS:

The key to Energy salvation is not finding some super natural energy supply source, it is energy storage systems. Energy storage is the key to true key to humanity's energy prosperity. Many great minds across the globe already fully understand the need for sufficient energy storage methods. Nevertheless most are misguided in their quest to find a central energy storage system. They should instead focus on smaller more efficient energy storage devices which are more cost effective and require less manufacturing, and less energy to produce. Many central energy storage systems currently exist, but these system are all very costly and years away from making a real difference.


I believe all devices should be designed to work off the power grid for at least 72hrs minimum. All products should be designed with 2 internal energy storage systems, with one only operating while the other is charging, equally all products should not be connected to the power grid unless they are charging; phantom energy usage accounts for a majority of global energy waste, controlling it is the key to energy salvation. These few changes alone would produce more energy than 1000 nuclear power plants. Humanity waste more energy than we use, if we started working on more ways of reducing our wasted energy all new methods of energy production will be that much better.

A majority of our products are designed based on a 200yr old energy grid. How can we solve our energy need if were still perfecting industrial age technologies. It amazes me that the brilliant minds of today are still attempting to solve the same problems of previous generations. Too many choose to follow the lead of pervious innovators instead of finding their own paths to innovation. More creative minds need to start craving their own path. The time has come from more creativity, productivity and innovation.

The key to energy salvation is not solely finding new unlimited natural source of energy but equally using the energy supply we currently have more efficiently. We must not only search for new natural abundant energy sources but additionally finding ways of containing our currently wasted energy. I believe many of efforts globally are overly misguided in their quest for energy dominance. The ultimate quest should be for energy efficiency. The most efficient nation will find much more prosperity than Most. Focusing on energy storage system is the true key to energy dominance. Once wasted energy is efficiently contained then true quest for energy dominance can begin.

5. Conclusion

Lost in the pages of history is opportunity-

Generation after generation had the opportunity to work together-

And did not-

Are we to follow their lead or do we crave our own paths?

Only time will tell!!

Opportunities fall from the sky like golden rain drops. Many see the storm but don’t take advantage! What will you do?

Greed blinds many from seeing opportunity. Unlimited power means unlimited economic potential, unlimited prosperity and ultimately unlimited opportunities for all who seek. I believe we have an unbelievable opportunity to forever change our world. We could start creating surfaces which added to our planets energy diversification providing future sustainability an additional power options for future generations. Rain power is not cold fusion but it is another creative green energy method. WEDO TECHNOLOGY wants to bring rain power to life and with your help we will. Now is our time. This is our generation.

WEDO TECNOLOGY is sparking a CLEAN ENERGY RENAISSANCE. Now is our time. Together we must start leading and bringing forth solutions which can clean our environment and help our citizens.

 

6. UPDATE 1:

UNLIMITED NATURAL SUSTAINABLE
ELECTRICAL ENERGY THROUGH MOTION
THEORY: BY JOHN TAYLOR-WEDO TECHNOLOGY 12/27/15

I believe we may be closer to unlimited natural energy than we think. Future generations will need many different energy solutions to fuel growing populations. Humanity must start deriving more sustainable energy solutions to advance our planet and species.

I believe one of the many solutions will be to derive motion energy from natural occurring events in nature (such as: River current, Rain showers, lighting, Waterfalls, hurricanes, tidal energy, oceans energy, sandstorms, mudslides, earthquakes and more). I believe the key to unlimited sustainable energy will be derived form a combination of all these natural occurring events.

Unlimited energy is not the solution to humanity energy problems but it is a solution to how we derive unlimited electrical power energy. Again as I've stated in other opinions, the key to humanity’s energy problem is not unlimited energy systems; it’s a combination of energy storage systems (BATTERIES or similar devices) as well as, proper energy management (reducing and containing wasted energy). Nevertheless if humanity starts focusing on a combination these natural occurring sustainable solutions, we can achieve our goal of unlimited sustainable energy for future generations.

Note: In no way am I discounting solar or wind energy. Solar & Wind both are major keys to humanity progressions, because they both exist throughout space. Finding more effective and efficient solar & wind options will be critical for intergalactic space travel. (I would also like to note that I have an unbelievable addition to solar technology that will change the efficiency of solar technology for future generations (patent pending))

Others may have similar theories but if they exist I have not seen nor read them. My theory is based off my opinion. No one has all the answers but all great minds will have their own opinions on futuristic ideas and innovations. I'm just making sure my theories are public.

John Taylor

WEDO TECHNOLOGY

Risks & Challenges

I truly see the challenge many great minds had when trying to relay futuristic visions and new concepts to the general public. Most simple minds lack the capacity in understanding non existing innovations and concepts. I’ve come to recognize that it’s extremely hard for many to grasp such complex visions of our future. Too many attempted to correlate my projects with non-similar existing creations, not fully seeing the many differences my systems present. Sometimes it’s hard to relay a vision to those without the capacity to understand the concepts. Nevertheless, like many driven minds before me, I push forward.
I will not let anyone stop me from showing the world, that there are creative solutions which can help clean our planet and bring more opportunities & prosperity to all of our peoples. WEDO Technology is here to change the world and with your support we know we will.

Special Note:

WEDO Technology is launching #innovationBONANZA  & #cleanENERGYrenaissance  campaigns from 12/10-12/31. The goal of these campaigns are to promote the Crowdfunding Community, creativity, unity, innovation,  and clean sustainable solutions for our planet and future generations. Now is the time for capable minds to step-up. This is our Generation!

WEDO TECHNOLOGY is launching several Crowd Funding campaigns related to the NEXUS HS project, RAIN POWER RESEARCH, and other clean energy solutions and future WEDO TECHNOLOGY products and services. All of the campaigns are only initial funding goals, once initial funding goals are meet more efforts can be put into reaching larger funding objective. All the campaigns are necessary to generate more public awareness for these massive undertakings.

NEXUS HS related campaigns:
1. THE NEXUS HS PROJECT: 
2. THE NEXUS HS PROJECT: MODEL1 DESIGN & R&D
3. THE NEXUS HS PROJECT: MARKETING & PUBLIC AWARENESS
4. THE WEDO TECHNOLOGY NEXUS HS GROWTHHACKER SUMMIT: 7/16:

CLEAN ENERGY related campaigns:
1. RAIN POWER RESEARCH: WEDO TECHNOLOGY RESEARCH FOR RAIN POWER
2. 30-90 DAY RECHARGABLE CELLPHONE BATTERY RESEARCH

Rain power is not cold fusion but it is another creative green energy method. WEDO TECHNOLOGY wants to bring rain power to life and with your help we will. Now is our time. This is our generation.
WEDO TECNOLOGY is sparking a CLEAN ENERGY RENAISSANCE. Now is our time. Together we must start leading and bringing forth solutions which can clean our environment and help our citizens.
 
6. UPDATE 1:
UNLIMITED NATURAL SUSTAINABLEELECTRICAL ENERGY THROUGH MOTION THEORY: BY JOHN TAYLOR-WEDO TECHNOLOGY 12/27/15
I believe we may be closer to unlimited natural energy than we think. Future generations will need many different energy solutions to fuel growing populations. Humanity must start deriving more sustainable energy solutions to advance our planet and species.
I believe one of the many solutions will be to derive motion energy from natural occurring events in nature (such as: River current, Rain showers, lighting, Waterfalls, hurricanes, tidal energy, oceans energy, sandstorms, mudslides, earthquakes and more). I believe the key to unlimited sustainable energy will be derived form a combination of all these natural occurring events.
Unlimited energy is not the solution to humanity energy problems but it is a solution to how we derive unlimited electrical power energy. Again as I've stated in other opinions, the key to humanity’s energy problem is not unlimited energy systems; it’s a combination of energy storage systems (BATTERIES or similar devices) as well as, proper energy management (reducing and containing wasted energy). Nevertheless if humanity starts focusing on a combination these natural occurring sustainable solutions, we can achieve our goal of unlimited sustainable energy for future generations.
Note: In no way am I discounting solar or wind energy. Solar & Wind both are major keys to humanity progressions, because they both exist throughout space. Finding more effective and efficient solar & wind options will be critical for intergalactic space travel. (I would also like to note that I have an unbelievable addition to solar technology that will change the efficiency of solar technology for future generations (patent pending))
Others may have similar theories but if they exist I have not seen nor read them. My theory is based off my opinion. No one has all the answers but all great minds will have their own opinions on futuristic ideas and innovations. I'm just making sure my theories are public.
John Taylor
WEDO TECHNOLOGY
Risks & Challenges
I truly see the challenge many great minds had when trying to relay futuristic visions and new concepts to the general public. Most simple minds lack the capacity in understanding non existing innovations and concepts. I’ve come to recognize that it’s extremely hard for many to grasp such complex visions of our future. Too many attempted to correlate my projects with non-similar existing creations, not fully seeing the many differences my systems present. Sometimes it’s hard to relay a vision to those without the capacity to understand the concepts. Nevertheless, like many driven minds before me, I push forward.  I will not let anyone stop me from showing the world, that there are creative solutions which can help clean our planet and bring more opportunities & prosperity to all of our peoples. WEDO Technology is here to change the world and with your support we know we will.
Special Note: 
WEDO Technology is launching #innovationBONANZA  & #cleanENERGYrenaissance  campaigns from 12/10-12/31. The goal of these campaigns are to promote the Crowdfunding Community, creativity, unity, innovation,  and clean sustainable solutions for our planet and future generations. Now is the time for capable minds to step-up. This is our Generation!
WEDO TECHNOLOGY is launching several Crowd Funding campaigns related to the NEXUS HS project, RAIN POWER RESEARCH, and other clean energy solutions and future WEDO TECHNOLOGY products and services. All of the campaigns are only initial funding goals, once initial funding goals are meet more efforts can be put into reaching larger funding objective. All the campaigns are necessary to generate more public awareness for these massive undertakings.
NEXUS HS related campaigns: 1.	THE NEXUS HS PROJECT:  2.	 THE NEXUS HS PROJECT: MODEL1 DESIGN & R&D 3.	THE NEXUS HS PROJECT: MARKETING & PUBLIC AWARENESS 4.	THE WEDO TECHNOLOGY NEXUS HS GROWTHHACKER SUMMIT: 7/16:
CLEAN ENERGY related campaigns: 1.	RAIN POWER RESEARCH: WEDO TECHNOLOGY RESEARCH FOR RAIN POWER 2.	 30-90 DAY RECHARGABLE CELLPHONE BATTERY RESEARCH

story:
NYC Decal, the one we need help crowdfunding with.


Short Summary

TheDecalCollective.com

I am a double engineering major currently at a state university. As a young adult who has worked many jobs in many different industries, I decided to put my skills to the test and create an awesome small business by college students for college students. This is extremely important to me, as I have put a lot of my own time and money into this business to get it off the ground. If this becomes a successful venture, I want to hire other college students and to also begin donating a portion of the profit to charity. If I do not get help from contributors, I stand to have a very slow increase in growth which might take me a while, as all my funds are wrapped into this business. I am passionate about this, and am working hours each day to make this a business as sustainable, eco friendly, college budget friendly, and philanthropical as possible.

What We Need & What You Get

  • I will need about 500 dollars:
  • To pay designers for new designs which are custom to college universities in order to cater to school spirit
  • To use facebook marketing campaigns to acquire more website clicks and page likes
  • To be able to create an ambassador program to get other college students to sell the decals at their respective campus 
  • If I do not reach my entire goal, I will try to acquire manufacture more inventory at a lower price in order to make the product more affordable.

Risks & Challenges

There are going to be a few challenges: to get prices down in order to make retail prices much more affordable for customers. People want all of the designs and decals in the pipeline all at the same time, which requires too much capital for me to perform. I have been the director of retail operations, with 8 employees receiving record high profits in one season of 65,000$ due to working 80 hours each week, and with the money given, I can promise just that.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please share TheDecalCollective.com website as it is a really good business with a lot of great innovative designs with a very clear and exciting future!

story:
Our Story...Why Gud n Free?

The table is set and it's time to eat...dig in.  All of a sudden, my youngest daughter starts vomiting violently.  Only two-years-old, she desperately wants to eat, even after getting sick.  But she can't.  She cries, my wife cries, and I have tears welling up...unaware of what to do, to help my baby girl.  That was the start of learning Alyssa had Celiac disease.  And through testing, we found out our oldest, Ava, also has celiac disease and is a-symptomatic...quietly destroying her insides.  So we started our gluten-free diet, like so many others have to do. Which in turn ended our carefree lifestyle of eating on the go.

I'm Mike Orlando.  My wife, Brenda and I have been living that lifestyle for five years.  We are working parents that care deeply for their children and struggle to find options in restaurants...at least, those that are definitely clear of contaminants. It is always a risk for us. Sometimes you just want to go out to eat or grab a quick bite on the go.

We don't want to be sad, angry, or depressed. We just want to take action. Gud and Free is our action. Gud n Free will be the first allergy-free restaurant in the region...we have found nothing like this within 250 miles of us. The facility will be free of wheat, gluten, fish and nuts. With our cooking style we can also avoid dairy and soy as well.

We will be serving burgers, breaded chicken sandwiches and subs on good bread or with many other features. We have worked to find good food, which took a lot of research as well as trial and error.  But it's good. You might not even know the difference, or perhaps like it better.

By helping us, you will give people the opportunity to eat the same foods that many take for granted...to feel "included" instead of "excluded."  We believe this will be something big, so don't think of it as a handout, think of it as doing your part to improve our community...paying it forward.

Families will unite over food again safely. Please join the cause and support us. You never know, it could be you or your family. Allergens and intolerances are consistently on the rise. Help us create this option here in Siouxland.

Together, Gud n Free will do it.

 

What We're Asking

 The goal for this crowd funding campaign is to raise 20,000 dollars.  The money raised will be used to furnish the new facility with new safe cooking equipment and comfortable seating and décor. Those with food allergies and intolerances know how necessary a safe kitchen is to the dining experience. For those with food allergies and intolerances, you will be excited to know we are looking out for you Any time you’re in our area…you have a safe place to eat.  Remember, there’s nothing like this in our part of the country, and we want to spread the word.

 

The Impact

 Gud n Free allows the chance for people to have a safe dining experience that everyone deserves.  On a broader level, it’s the concept of giving back to our community….making all people feel welcome.  When you donate, you can know you are doing something for the greater good. 

The food will be “stick to your ribs” comfort fast food of the Midwest to include burgers with buns, fries and breaded chicken. Other options will include salads and subs. We hope to branch out into baked goods very soon, as well.  We want to have a menu that would attract more than just allergy-free people, as people unite around food. We believe we have achieved that. We want to see families enjoying themselves eating out at our location without worry. 

It might not be for everyone…but at least we know it can be for anyone.   I (Mike) have a background in marketing and public relations, while I have enlisted the help of a trained chef, who has helped run four restaurants.  From a business
sense, we have people on our team that have areas of expertise in accounting,
sales, food and beverage and restaurant management.  We have the people to make this work. We have done our research.

Ways You Can Help

Any denomination of a cash donation helps. See our perks!

You can help by coming to Gud n Free and trying our food when we open. We would love to serve you. 

Also, help us by spreading the word to everyone you know especially including those with allergies and intolerances. We believe many of those with allergies and intolerances will also believe in our cause, and there are many passionate people out there. Spread the word to others about us here on Indiegogo and on Facebook.  

Thank you so much for your support!  Our family, and many like us will be so grateful.

story:
Announcing... LUV Custom Prints!

We are relaunching & expanding our Worker Cooperative Screenprinting Shop, and we need your help to bring our vision to life. Here's a little about us:

The Past:

  • Occupy Wall Street Screenprinters, est 2011, began in Zuccotti Park during the OWS encampment. Totally grassroots, we started out printing on shirts that people brought along with them. At that time, all funds raised at the pop-up print station were donated back to the OWS General Assembly. Since then, we have developed into a full service custom print shop, working with such clients as 350.org, Park Slope Food Coop, and the War Resisters League. It is our continual goal to bring the art of screenprinting to social justice campaigns in NYC and beyond. 
The Present:
  • Peninsula Custom Prints is an aspiring worker cooperative, soon to be established in Far Rockaway. Its founders are members of Rockaway Wildfire, which organized as a massive recovery campaign in one of the hardest-hit communities after Hurricane Sandy. They are on track to open their own shop later in 2016.
  • Our NEW effort, LUV CUSTOM PRINTS, will be the combined work of OWS and Peninsula. Jules from OWS has been actively training Peninsula members in the art and craft of screenprinting since August 2015. 
  • Our partnership with the Park Slope Food Coop has been instrumental in our training, and has provided an opportunity to establish a national coop supply chain. The shopping bags for PSFC are ethical all the way through -- the organic cotton bags were printed by Opportunity Threads, a cooperative cut-and-sew factory in North Carolina, and hand-printed here in our Brooklyn workspace.
The Future:
  • We are passionate about the effect of fairly printed apparel and its impact on social justice campaigns. Through workshops, custom print services, and establishing a horizontally managed workplace, we seek to revolutionize the garment industry and start bringing production back from overseas sweatshops. 
  • Raising these funds will allow us to make necessary expansions to our space, our equipment, and our overall printing capacity. This in turn will allow us to provide an increased volume of services, at affordable prices, to the greater community.

What We Need 

We are aiming to raise $10,000 for operating expenses and new equipment. 

  • Ryonet "Little Buddy" Conveyor Dryer + Temp Control - $3,200
  • Macbook Pro Laptop for design work - $2,000
  • New Screens and an expanded selection of ink - $800
  • Upgrades to our shop lighting and ventilation - $500
  • A working budget to cover 4 months of shop rent and utilities (appx $600/month) - $2400
  • Space heaters to keep us toasty in the winter - $120
  • Improved lighting in our press room and office - $200
  • Emulsion, Reclaimer, Ink Wash and other chemical supplies - $300
  • 1 year membership for Quickbooks Online accounting software - $480
  • In the event we do not reach our goal, this list is prioritized in order of what we'll purchase with the funds that are raised. 

What You Get

We have some awesome radical gear to share with our supporters!

  • $25 Donation: Custom printed, organic cotton tote bag featuring a limited edition design
  • $50 Donation: Custom printed, organic cotton tee featuring a limited edition design
  • $100 Donation: Custom printed tee & tote, plus a special hand printed poster
  • $500+ Donation: We have a few of our original silkscreens remaining from the Occupation of Zuccotti Park. They have been dear to us since they were recovered from the city sanitation department, returned from a police raid only slightly worse for the wear! We would be happy to turn a few of these into collectors' items to commemorate the pure joy of those days of public artmaking... 


Other Ways You Can Help

Some people can't contribute financially, but that doesn't mean they can't help. Our community print shop would love to receive your support in so many ways:

  • Please help us spread the word! Share this page on social media or talk us up to your friends -- community support is truly invaluable to this project.
  • Pick up something specific from our Wish List! 
  • Share this campaign on social media via Indiegogo's share tools.
  • Send us your inquiries for custom print jobs, live printing at events, or hosting workshops!

THANK YOU!!!

With LUV,

Cruz, Luis, Diego, Mac & Jules

story: I have stopped raising funds for this campaign. Thanks for everyone's support!

story:
Who are we?

Firstly, we would like to thank you for reading our story.

Hillside Brewery is an exciting, family owned and run business built on traditional skills and values. We are based on a stunning 40 acre farm in Gloucestershire. 

We launched in May 2014 and things have gone from strength to strength. Over the past year we have: 

  • Won over 16 awards.
  • Installed eco-friendly & sustainable brewing methods.
  • Developed unique and exciting on site experiences & activities.

This crowdfunding will help to keep this momentum moving forwards. 


What We Need & What You Get?

We are aiming to raise this money to start a project to renovate one of our disused barns, which will create:

  • All seasons facility.
  • Onsite café by Hetty's Tea Party.
  • Allow us to develop unique on site experiences for all ages - from team building to an indoor cinema.
  • A site to host an extensive range of regular events during the year.
  • Kids play area. 
  • More beer related events!
We have developed some great rewards and would love you to be part of it and help join us in shaping the future of Hillside brewery. 
  • Many rewards are one off and exclusive, that you wont be able to get anywhere else. 
  • Range of rewards from Brewing your own beer to Archery Tag.


Why Support Us?

We want to become one of the most exciting Gloucestershire visitor attractions. Without your contribution we wont be able to develop this barn and extend our offerings. Your support will help to achieve the following:

  • Shaping the future direction of Hillside brewery and becoming part of the family.
  • Being able to enjoy the benefits of the site with multiple activities on your doorstep.
  • Improving the facilities for the local community.
  • Bringing the community together.

  • Help support the local economy. 



Risks & Challenges

This is going to be a big project and we are keen to see it through until its completion. One of the biggest issues we face is our cash flow. We have spent the past 16 months re-investing in the site and now we need to take a bigger step into the future. This crowdfunding will help achieve this whilst also encouraging a much broader involvement in the Hillside vision and some excellent rewards for people to enjoy.

One of our biggest strengths is also our biggest chellenge - our location. We are based on a stunning 40 acre farm and it has been a challenge making sure people are aware of us and all the site has to offer. The site is conveniently located off the A40 and once people have been to visit they love it. You can really help us to get the word out.


Other Ways You Can Help

We appreciate that not everyone will be able to contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help. 

  • Please help us get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Indiegogo has some great sharing tools so please do use them.

Thank you for your reading our proposal, I hope you will find a reward that appeals to you and it would be great to see you at Hillside Brewery soon.

Many thanks,

Paul & the whole Hillside Brewery Team

story:
Short Summary

Invest in the Internet of Things. A market of 30 billion devices in 2020. Get involved and build together with us the biggest internet-of-things network on the world! And yes... we must start somewhere, so we already did a rollout in the Netherlands.


So how we going to fix this. First of all let me introduce the company which is able to rollout on a worldwide-scale. The Telecom Company B.V. (B.V. is a Dutch private company which issue shares). This company offers a total solution in the field of mobile telecommunications and is a spinoff of the Dutch paging operator Callmax (one of the competitors of KPN in the 90s). We are deploying new telecommunication technologies, such as WiFi, Private GSM / LTE and the Internet-of Things (IoT). Just a month ago we launched internet-of-things (IoT) networks in  Eindhoven, Breda, Tilburg and Antwerp. Our goal for today is to rollout worldwide. We have more than enough experience in the field of telecommunication and have an in-house development team to make the best telecommunication solutions for our costumers.

Besides of that, we got after a successful funding campaign, the backup from a venture capitalist, so that will speed things a little but up ;-)

Let's talk about myself. I'm Chris van Steenbergen a young entrepreneur (now 35) started way-back in 1996 to connected people to the Internet. In that time it was only possible to get 'online' when you got a dial-up modem with an amazing speed of 1200 bps (1 Mbps = 1000000 bps). In that time I was involved in setting up a dial-in Internet Provider in the Netherlands to give these modems access to the Internet. Actually you couldn't call it internet since it was a system of bulletin boards systems(BBS). The real Internet was with Netscape Navigator which could download HTML pages. In 2004 I started a Wireless Internet Service Provider (when WiFi was called 802.11) with more than 5000 connections and covered several hospitals, elderly care centers and cities like Rotterdam (mobile Wimax) and Amsterdam (iBurst). In 2007 I takeover the nationwide paging operator Callmax and in 2013 the spin-off The Telecom Company was born. Looking back to nowadays, I'm still in the telecom business and i'm still doing the same from what I was starting with: Connecting devices instead of people on the Internet. 


What We Need

First of all, we need your support, without an army we cannot conquer the world. I am a very driven entrepreneur with a lot of connections (15.000+ on LinkedIn) so that is a good start. But on a global scale that's nothing. 

So what is the plan.... simple, just get IoT gateways like (below) up-and-running in the whole world and get these devices connected.


How can I support

You can support us in 2 ways:

As a network builder. We will organize an IoT-Kit to get you up-and-running to build your own Internet of Things network in your neighbourhood, including the full support of our team. We take care of the collected data from devices which will be handled and saved on our 'open' cloud-database. Your gateway will be one of the gateways which will be installed worldwide.

As an investor. We are welcoming you to get you on board of our telecom venture. Back us in the worldwide network rollout and support our company to become a global telecommunication operator for the Internet-of-Things. 

With both ways, with the revenue we realise, we will help other entrepreneurs in building wonderful things. One of the things we currently working on is a bracelet to track-and-trace elderly, children or even your car.

If don't worry if you cannot make a choice. Your donation will help us a little bit closer to reach our goals.

If we are not succeeded in our campaign, then we will still delivering the gateways and give it another try when the market is ready for us.


The Specs


Comparing to other competitors in the market:
- More than 30% cheaper than other IoT gateways in the market.
- Provide coverage up to 22 kilometers with 5 dBi external antenna.
- The gateway is modular build and can be customized.
- Runs in standalone or mesh mode to cover entire cities.
- One gateway is able to serve up to 10.000 IoT devices.

The Impact


As Internet connectivity gets embedded into everything from baby monitors to industrial sensors, investors, entrepreneurs and engineers are rushing to cash in. According to Gartner, Internet of Things (IoT) vendors will earn more than $309 billion by 2020. However, most of those earnings will come from services.

The Impact is tremendous, even if we are getting only 1% of the 30 billion devices connected by 2020 we are doing great!

The IoT (Internet of Things) technology is a huge step forward in the management of devices around us. In 2020, at least 212 billion devices are in the market waiting to get connected to the Internet. In this growing market we need a global organisation, to providing the infrastructure to the people devices. Let's make this devices communicate on our gateways. The time is now to get in this huge growth market. 


Risks & Challenges

Are there risks? Ofcourse there are risks, one of the risk is that we don't have enough support and we cannot overwhelming the world with blinking IoT gateways. In that case we will be very upset :-( 


Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the world, if you are not able to contribute, that doesn't mean that you cannot help. Share this on Facebook, Twitter or make a photo and post it on Instagram. If you want to help in the promotion, let's show us you creativity side.

Questions? Don't hesitate to contact us. 

Let's make some noise (in the air)!
