story:
Bakerz R'Us is Helping the Community!

The Bakerz love to share their passion for all things sweet and delicious with everyone.  So this holiday season, we would like to help the less fortunate by contributing in several ways! 

Our passion for baking is the foundation of our success, but our humility and humbleness is what will push us forward. The community has helped us so much by ordering our delicious sweets, marketing our brand across both Miami Dade and Broward County, as well as other small gestures. We thought, it's about time the Bakerz gave back!

What We Need & What You Get

Here is where your donation(s) will contribute to (and yes, we have a few ideas in mind).  Even if we can't reach our goal, we will still honor your contribution as well as donate as much as we can make.

  • From now until Thanksgiving Day, all proceeds will go towards making pies (Apple, Pumpkin and Cherry) for the homeless, or otherwise unable to feed themselves and/or their families, so that they can enjoy after their main course.
  • On Christmas, all proceeds will go towards making small treats for the homeless, or otherwise unable to feed themselves and/or their families, so that they can have at least one gift to enjoy.
  • From now until Christmas, anyone who donates will receive 10% off of their order (of $30 or more) as a thank you for donating!

The Impact

The impact is clear. Fill the hearts of those who are in a tough position with sweet goodies and hope that this small gesture can be passed along the rest of the community.

This is our chance to help those that have a hard time receiving help and give back! We need your help to make this happen! 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help!

  • We ask that if you can't make a contriobution to pass this along to all that can! 
  • Also, if you would like to help us on either of these events, we would greatly appreciate it! Give us a call so we can work out the details at 786.303.1557 !

And that's all there is to it. We, the Bakerz, wish you and your families a very happy holiday season, and hope you can help us in making the less fortunate's holidays just as joyous!

story:
Paliers atteint - Bearings reached :
Palier 1000€ - Atteint - Reached - Projet Lancé
Palier 4000€ - Atteint - Reached
Palier 8000€ - Atteint - Reached
État actuel : 10 193€


Aidez le spectacle à but non lucratif  

Help the nonprofit shows

L'association Lan-evasion œuvre maintenant depuis 4 ans avec un objectif :
Fournir aux artistes, groupes de musique, associations et organisations locales, du soutien matériel, technique et humain pour la réalisation de spectacles culturels à but non lucratif.

"The Lan-evasion Association is now working since 4 years with one objective :
To provide an equipment, technical and human support for artists, music groups,  local associations and organizations for non profit cultural performances"

Composée de membres passionnés par la technique du spectacle, nous arrivons aujourd'hui à réaliser des évènements allant du cabaret, soirée de gala et dansante au concert. Rien de plus satisfaisant que d'avoir réussi à aider d'autres personnes à réaliser leurs projets en supprimant la barrière des coûts matériels et humains quand les projets ne disposent pas de moyens financiers importants.

"Made up of members fascinated by the technique of the entertainment, we manage today to realize events from cabaret, gala, dancing wedding and concert. Nothing more satisfying than having managed to help others to realize their projects, by eliminating the human and material costs barrier when the projects do not arrange important financial means."

Par exemple, la fête de la musique en 2015 :
"For example the music festival in 2015"


Aujourd'hui, grâce au travail et à la motivation des membres, nous avons réussi à constituer un premier parc de matériel permettant d'accompagner et aider de manière presque indépendante de toute prestation externe.

"Today, thanks to the work and motivation of our members, we managed to constitute a first equipment depot allowing to accompany and help in an almost independent way of any external serivces."

Cette campagne est ouverte à tous, particuliers, associations, groupes de musique, entreprises et tout les autres, nous serions très heureux d'obtenir même 5€ de chacun d'entre vous pour faire avancer le projet.

"This campain is open to all individuals, music groups, businesses, and all the others. We would love to get even €5 from each of you to take forward the project"

SELECT A PERK


Pour ce gros défi, nous avons besoins de vous !

For this big challenge, we need you !

Pour quoi  ? "What for ?"

Cette année, nous souhaiterions pouvoir faire en sorte que le public puisse voir et profiter, en tout point de salle, de ce qu'il se passe sur scène, mais aussi de pouvoir offrir aux musiciens et groupes, lors des concerts, le meilleur matériel de scène possible. Le matériel coûte cher car il est spécial et relativement rare. Ce choix s'est orienté en voyant les coûts de location exorbitants que demandent des prestataires professionnels. Encore une fois, grâce à vous, son utilisation ne sera pas destinée à un but lucratif et pourra profiter aux autres.

"This year, we would like to ensure that the public can see and enjoy, from any point of a room, what happens on stage, but also to offer the best stage equipment of possible to musicians and groups during concerts. The equipment is expensive because it is special and relatively rare. We made this choice when we saw exaggerated costs of rentals required by professional provider. Once again, thanks to you, its use will not be intended for a lucrative purpose and can benefit the others."

Les besoins  "Needs"

La solution retenue est un écran modulaire sous la forme d'éléments de 50 cm par 50 cm, pour une résolution 25 600 Pixels par m². Un écran de taille adéquate est composé de 48 dalles pour former une image de 4 * 3 mètres.

"The chosen solution is a modular display as 50 by 50 centimeters by elements for 25,600 pixels per sqm. A suitable size screen is made up of slabs 48 to form an image of 157,48 by 118,1 inches ! That is very nice for smaller stage"




Ces dalles peuvent s'assembler dans de multiples configurations, pouvant ainsi construire différents types d'écrans (comme des Lego®) , vous pouvez voir, ci-dessous, une démonstration de montage et d'utilisation (vidéo).

"These tiles can be assembled in a variety of configuration, being able to build different types of display screens (such as Lego®), you can see in this video, a demonstration of assembling and use."


On peut donc imaginer une présentation comme ci-dessous dans un concert :
"We can thus imagine a presentation as below in a concert:"


 
Les chiffres "The costs"

Une dalle coûte 927€ TTC, déjà négociée à 28% de moins que le prix grand public, pour un besoin de 48 dalles, il en reviendrait à 44 496€ TTC le coût complet d'un écran de ce type.

"One slab costs €927 with VAT, already negotiated in 28% less than the public price, for a need of 48 tiles, the full cost of a screen of this type would be €44,496 with VAT."

Budget prévisionnel de l'opération :  "Estimated operation's budget"
    Apports "Contributions"

  1. Partenaires et sponsors locaux "local sponsors and partners" : 8 000€
  2. De mécènes  : 1000€
    Total : 9 000,00€ déjà disponibles en dehors de indiegogo
    "already available outside of Indiegogo"
Pour ce qu'il reste, nous sommes en train de démarcher les entreprises pour leurs demander de nous donner un coup de main, mais c'est très compliqué...

"For what remains, we are approaching businesses, asking them to give us a hand, but it's very complicated..."


SELECT A PERK

Les paliers :

Bearings

Pour "For"  : 1 000€ : (REACHED) - Atteint

Contient "Contains" :
  • 1 Processeur Vidéo "Video Processor"
  • 8 Flykit pour monter l'écran complet "To make the full display"
  • 4 Flykit pour fabriquer des totems "To make totems"
  • 4 FlyCase pour ranger les équipements "To store equipments"
Pour "For"  : 4 000€ : (REACHED) - Atteint
Le premier mêtre carré d'écran - "to reach 1 square metters"


Pour "For" : 8 000€ : (reached) - Atteint
Ce sera 4M² d'écran au total - "to reach 4 square metters"Pour "For" : 16 000€ : (Not reached) - Non atteint
Ce sera 8M² d'écran au total - "to reach 8 square mettersPour "For" : 31 200€ : (Not reached) - Non atteint

Ce sera 12M² d'écran au total - "to reach 16 square metters, that the MOST !!!"



Nous aider, c'est aussi aider les autres

Helping us, means helping others

Nous soutenir, c'est également aider d'autres associations, groupes de musiques,  et artistiques qui souhaitent réaliser des spectacles sans avoir des moyens financiers importants.

"We support is also helping other art association, music groups and artistics, wishing to achieve performances without significant financial resources"

Par exemple, le matériel sera mis en œuvre sur une manifestation en direction des jeunes, le Tremplin des artistes 2016, où plusieurs d’entre eux vont être invités à présenter leur talent sur scène, devant un public et un jury.

"For example, the equipment will be implemented on an event for young people, artists spingboard Tremplin des artistes 2016, when several of them will be invited to present their talent on a stage in front of an audience and jury."

Ou bien encore, la Fête des lanternes, dans laquelle nous œuvrons à l'installation de matériel pour une chorale d'enfants où les parents viennent apprécier le travail de préparation qu'ils ont fournit toute l'année.

"Or, the Lantern festival in which we work for the installation of stage equipment for a childen's choir, where parents come to enjoy the preparation work they have provided throughout the year"

Il est également employé sur des concerts où les groupes cherchent à se faire connaître du public, mais ne bénéficient pas de moyens techniques adaptés pour y parvenir.

"It is also used on stage where groups seek to make themselves known to the public, but may not recieve appropriate technical means to achieve it."


Au total, en 2015, nous avons soutenu plus de 66 manifestations en Alsace, pour la plupart dans le Bas-Rhin, c'est une très belle satisfaction que d'avoir aidé autant de monde à aboutir à leurs projets.

"In total, in 2015, we have supported more than 66 events in france, it's a great satisfaction to have helped so many people to achieve their projects."


Un role important, souvent oublié

An important role, often overlooked

Notre association est aussi un tremplin vers l'emploi, nous sommes ouverts à tous bénévoles passionnés par les métiers de la scène et de l’événementiel, et qui aimeraient se forger une expérience, à force de pratique et d'apprentissage des techniques, plusieurs d'entre nos membres ont réussis une insertion professionnelle dans un métier de la même branche et se réalisent pleinement.

"Our association is also a stepping stone to employment, we are open to all volunteers passionate about special event management, and who would like to gain experience, with practice and technical learning. Some members have successfully found jobs in their field and fully realized."


D'autres façons d'aider

Other ways to help

Vous ne pouvez pas nous fournir directement votre aide, ce n'est pas grave !
Un petit coup de main tout de même précieux peut nous être fourni, il ne coûte cette fois-ci, que quelques secondes.

Partagez cette page pour nous soutenir en la publiant sur votre Facebook ou Twitter, n'oubliez pas que vous pouvez utiliser les outils directement sur le site Indiegogo.

"You cannot supply us directly your help, it does not matter ! A precious little help can be provided. It does not cost you any time, a few seconds. 

Share this page to support us by posting it on your Facebook or Twitter, remember that you can use the tools directly on Indiegogo website."

SELECT A PERK

Pour "For" : 8 000€ : (reached) - AtteintCe sera 4M² d'écran au total - "to reach 4 square metters"Pour "For" : 16 000€ : (Not reached) - Non atteintCe sera 8M² d'écran au total - "to reach 8 square mettersPour "For" : 31 200€ : (Not reached) - Non atteint
Ce sera 12M² d'écran au total - "to reach 16 square metters, that the MOST !!!"

Nous aider, c'est aussi aider les autres
Helping us, means helping others
Nous soutenir, c'est également aider d'autres associations, groupes de musiques,  et
 artistiques qui souhaitent réaliser des spectacles sans avoir des moyens financiers importants.
"We support is also helping other art association, music groups and artistics, wishing to achieve performances without significant financial resources"
Par exemple, le matériel sera mis en œuvre sur une manifestation en direction des jeunes, le Tremplin des artistes 2016, où plusieurs d’entre eux vont être invités à présenter leur talent sur scène, devant un public et un jury. "For example, the equipment will be implemented on an event for young people, artists spingboard Tremplin des artistes 2016, when several of them will be invited to present their talent on a stage in front of an audience and jury."

Ou bien encore, la Fête des lanternes, dans laquelle nous œuvrons à l'installation de matériel pour une chorale d'enfants où les parents viennent apprécier le travail de préparation qu'ils ont fournit toute l'année. "Or, the Lantern festival in which we work for the installation of stage equipment for a childen's choir, where parents come to enjoy the preparation work they have provided throughout the year"
Il est également employé sur des concerts où les groupes cherchent à se faire connaître du public, mais ne bénéficient pas de moyens techniques adaptés pour y parvenir."It is also used on stage where groups seek to make themselves known to the public, but may not recieve appropriate technical means to achieve it."

Au total, en 2015, nous avons soutenu plus de 66 manifestations en Alsace, pour la plupart dans le Bas-Rhin, c'est une très belle satisfaction que d'avoir aidé autant de monde à aboutir à leurs projets."In total, in 2015, we have supported more than 66 events in france, it's a great satisfaction to have helped so many people to achieve their projects."




Un role important, souvent oublié

An important role, often overlooked
Notre association est aussi un tremplin vers l'emploi, nous sommes ouverts à tous bénévoles passionnés par les métiers de la scène et de l’événementiel, et qui aimeraient se forger une expérience, à force de pratique et d'apprentissage des techniques, plusieurs d'entre nos membres ont réussis une insertion professionnelle dans un métier de la même branche et se réalisent pleinement.
"Our association is also a stepping stone to employment, we are open to all volunteers passionate about special event management, and who would like to gain experience, with practice and technical learning. Some members have successfully found jobs in their field and fully realized."






D'autres façons d'aider
Other ways to help
Vous ne pouvez pas nous fournir directement votre aide, ce n'est pas grave !Un petit coup de main tout de même précieux peut nous être fourni, il ne coûte cette fois-ci, que quelques secondes.
Partagez cette page pour nous soutenir en la publiant sur votre Facebook ou Twitter, n'oubliez pas que vous pouvez utiliser les outils directement sur le site Indiegogo.
"You cannot supply us directly your help, it does not matter ! A precious little help can be provided. It does not cost you any time, a few seconds. 
Share this page to support us by posting it on your Facebook or Twitter, remember that you can use the tools directly on Indiegogo website."

story:
The #whathaveyouinspired Movement

Each of us has a dream, a tiny little seed of hope, & the desire to live it.  Our little seed needs encouragement & support to make it blossom.

Growing up, my Great Aunt Mable was my encouragement.  She always told me I could do anything.  To this day, I can see her reassuring smile saying go for it.

Not everyone has my Aunt Mable cheering them on from the sidelines.  Not everyone has a support system; not one person saying you can do it.  The world is great at telling us our dreams are destined to fail, so why bother trying.  These are the people I want to reach.  These are the individuals I created the #whathaveyouinspired movement to help.

I made my dream a reality almost 2 years ago, after being diagnosed with cancer.  I learned the hard way we may not always have tomorrow.  We need to make our dreams happen today.  I created my company, called it Love 2 Inspire and opened Inspired Boutique; where I sell products made with reclaimed and upcycled materials crafted from my hands.  Up to this point, I've only sold what I've made.

I've been blessed to have my business grow steadily, allowing me to move into a prime location.  This move will finally allow me to begin fulfilling the true vision for Love 2 Inspire......making dreams a reality for others.

Our communities are full of talented men and women who need a little help growing their dream seed.  This new location will allow me the ability to be their encouragement and support.  All the motivation I need is the reward of inspiring someone else to live their dream; starting within my own community.

By providing a safe and creative environment for local craftsmen/women, amazing custom displays, wonderful signage and traffic of over 6 million people annually, I'm removing huge roadblocks and hurdles to making their crafts a viable and successful business.  This will also remove a major financial burden for these talented individuals.

Along with helping local craftsmen/women, I want to lift up those who feel they no longer have a dream seed.  Those who've had their seed trampled or crushed. Those who just need to know someone still care.  I still care!

I could move into my new space, renovate, build, and sell just my kreations single handedly, but who'll benefit?  Just me, myself, and I.   That's not acceptable to me.  I want men and women from my local rescue mission and community to benefit.  I want to hire those who need a hand-up, not a handout.  If you walk through your local mission, I know you'll find skilled and talented workers;  relying on their services due to circumstances instead of choices.

The reason I named my company Love 2 Inspire was to INSPIRE! The same reason I started the #whathaveyouinspired movement.  To inspire change with love to create hope and opportunity.  I want everyone to know there's hope in ALL circumstances and share the blessings God has graced upon me.

I'd love for you to join the #whathaveyouinspired movement!  Will you help create hope and be the change?  Will you take a stand, instead of watching life happen from the sidelines?

#whathaveyouinspired      #inspirechangeandhope

How You can Inspire Change

Here's how the #whathaveyouinspired movement needs breakdown:


If we can't raise enough money, then I'll have to limit the number of craftspeople I bring into the boutique and the number of workers I hire.  I want to help as many people as possible.  If we don't raise enough funds, I will be forced to divide monies raised at the same percentage points as the full amount.  It won't have the same impact to the community or individuals in need.  I sincerely hope you'll help me avoid making those difficult cuts.  In exchange for your help, you can choose the perk package that best suits your budget.  (see perk information at the bottom of page)

The Impact

You may be wondering why should you join the #whathaveyouinspired movement and I'm glad you asked!  

First, think back to a time in your life when the odds were stacked against you.  How difficult was that time period?  If one person, one stranger would've been in your corner, how would it have changed your perspective?  All it takes is one person to start a small ripple in the water.  Just think of the wave we could create if our individual waves were joined together.  We could change the world.

Second, that's exactly what my long term goal is....to change the world.  I may be starting in my own community, but I have my sites set on yours, and yours, and yours.  Eventually, I'd love to have my brick & mortar (and online) boutique filled with wares from around the world.  All handcrafted by individuals struggling to grow their dream seed.  Then I can begin to hire more individuals that need work. Imagine if the movement inspires other businesses and individuals to do the same in their communities!

I have to start somewhere, at the beginning and I'd feel blessed to have you join my movement.  A movement to make dreams reality.  To show dreams are possible and worth nurturing.  That each and every person has a dream they can achieve.  It may take a village to raise a child, but it takes that same village to raise a dream, a person from the ashes.  

Who knows where your contribution can take our movement.  Today it might be creating a job painting a display, for a single father trying to keep his family together at the Rescue Mission.  Tomorrow it might be the same single father selling his handcrafted products to a world-wide customer base; allowing him to buy a home, send his kids to college, and inspire them to dream.  One of those children may discover the cure for cancer.  

I do know it can NOT happen if we don't try.  If we don't encourage.  If we don't support.  Will you start a little ripple with me?  

Risks & Challenge

I've been blessed and my locally owned small business has grown, but I'm still small.  Being a small business myself, it's beyond my capabilities to handle this entire movement myself.  I need a little help from you to let it see the light of day.

I'm providing a prime location that has over 6 million visitors annually.  I can hardly believe it's possible after two years, let alone if I was just starting out on the unknown world of being self-employed.  I wouldn't have made it this far if a friend hadn't offered his unused office space at a price I could afford.  He asked for far less than it was worth, but I couldn't have afforded a penny more.  This allowed me the opportunity to see if my dream could blossom.  I want to do the same for others.   I want to pay it forward. 

Along with a physical location, I'm providing the insurance, an online boutique, sales staff, and advertising for each and every crafts-person I bring on board.  This is all I can afford to do alone.  I wish I had unlimited resources, but that isn't the case.  I need your help to make this movement possible.

The proper professional displays to suit each product, custom business signs, and labor to make it all happen will take a huge financial burden off each craftsman/woman; along with burdens of the next paycheck or meal for some at the Rescue mission.  The effects will be felt throughout the area and the money they earn will be spent back into the community.

Other Ways You Can Help

I know some of you are in the situations I described in the beginning.  You're in need of encouragement and support.  The great news is you can still make a huge difference by sharing our campaign with everyone you know.  As a matter of fact, we're offering a special prize to one lucky person.  Once we reach our goal and our campaign has ended, the person who shared our campaign to the largest number of people who became donors will win a special prize.  The winner and only the winner will walk away with an embroidered ski jacket bearing our movement title.  You can proudly show off the impact you made toward inspiring change with love to create hope.  This prize is worth over $400.  Throughout the campaign, I'll post sneak peeks of the prize.

Perks

$2 Start w/a Drop Perk
With the Start w/a Drop perk, you'll receive a personal thank you via your favorite social media platform.  I'll post, tweet, Instagram, or pin your thank you for everyone to see.  Just email your platform with your info and within 72 hours you'll receive your shout out! 

Social Platform options: Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, Google +, or Pinterest.  Just choose the one that suits you best!
Email to love2inspireyou@gmail.com and reference #whathaveyouinspired in the subject line.
__________________________________________________________________________
$15 Ripples Form Perk
With the Ripples Form perk, you'll receive a handwritten thank you on a handcrafted card delivered right to your door.  You'll also be listed on our final social media thank you post, tweet, and pin once our campaign has reached its goal.  Just email me your mailing address and wait for your special delivery to arrive!
Email to love2inspireyou@gmail.com and reference #whathaveyouinspiredletter in the subject line.
___________________________________________________________________________
$35 The Ripple Effect Perk
With the Ripple Effect perk, you'll receive a custom #whahaveyouinspired short-sleeved t-shirt or a shirt for your favorite four-legged friend.  Email love2insireyou@gmail.com with your choice, style, and size.  Reference Ripple Effect in the subject line.
Choose between:

Doggie Skins Doggie Top - Sweet or Sporty Style

100% combed ring-spun cotton 5.0-ounce baby rib top. Double-needle stitched rib binding on neck and leg holes.

For breeds with larger chests, known as "barrel chests", please purchase one size up from weight range: XS (0-4 lbs); S (5-10 lbs); M (11-23 lbs); L (24-45 lbs); XL (46-70 lbs); 2X (71-85 lbs); 3X (86+ lbs)

For sizing, measure your dog's "chest" at the widest part. Please refer to the size chart. The body width measurement represents the "chest" size.

or

Sizes: S - 3XL

Sizes: S- 2XL
___________________________________________________________________________
$50 The Ripples Become Waves Perk
With the Ripples become Waves perk, you'll receive a custom long sleeve #whathaveyouinspired shirt in your choice of unisex or women's style.  Email love2inspireyou@gmail.com with the style and size.  Reference Ripples become waves in the subject line.
Choose from:

Long Sleeve Essential Blended Performance Tee - Men's

Get ready for the cooler weather with a long sleeve version of a favorite tee. Made with Dry Zone® moisture-wicking technology and from soft 4.5-ounce, 65/35 poly/cotton, it is unbeatable in comfort and performance.
Features include hemmed cuffs and a removable tag.

Sizes: S-4XL 


Preppy Patch Tee- Women's Slim Fit

Bringing fashion to a well-loved classic look. Made of 3.5 oz; 60%cotton/ 40% polyester jersey. This tee will feature an ultra comfortable blend with raglan sleeves, self-fabric cuffs, and contrasting elbow patching. The back sports our movement's hashtag in brilliant blue glitter.

Sizes: XS-2XL

__________________________________________________________________________

$65 The Tide Shifts Perk

With the Tide Shifts perk, you'll receive your choice of a custom #whathaveyouinspired hoodie in two styles.  Email your choice, style, and size to love2inspireyou@gmail.com.  Reference Tide Shift in the subject line.

Fleece Pullover Hoodie - Unisex Sporty or Sweet

Through chilly mornings and late night practices, warm up in this basic fleece pullover hoodie. Crafted with 7.8 oz; 50% ring spun cotton,50% polyester. 

Sizes: XS - 2XL

_________________________________________________________________________

$100 Record Breaking Waves Perk

With the Record Breaking Waves perk, you'll receive a custom t-shirt & sweatshirt. You'll also receive a sneak peek of the new displays, signs, and crafters before anyone else via email. Email me your style and sizes for both items to love2inspireyou@mail.com.  Reference Record Breaking in the subject line.

With the Ride the Waves perk, you'll receive a custom shirt for your favorite four legged friend, a short sleeved shirt, and a custom soft shelled jacket.  You'll also receive a sneak peek of the new displays, signs, and crafters before anyone else via email. Here are your choices:

For sizing, measure your dog's "chest" at the widest part. Please refer to the size chart. The body width measurement represents the "chest" size.

Long Sleeve Essential Blended Performance Tee - Men's
Get ready for the cooler weather with a long sleeve version of a favorite tee. Made with Dry Zone® moisture-wicking technology and from soft 4.5-ounce, 65/35 poly/cotton, it is unbeatable in comfort and performance.Features include hemmed cuffs and a removable tag.

Preppy Patch Tee- Women's Slim Fit

story:
Upgrade Odoo Community Edition!


Odoo 9 is split into two version:

Enterprise Edition - beautiful design, with many new features.
And Community Edition - outdated design, with only few new features.

Our goal is to upgrade Odoo Community Edition.

We want to create a set of modules which you could buy in the Odoo Apps Store
Modules will cost about 300-500 EUR (330-550 USD)
On this fundraiser, you can buy them for a part of this amount!

On the green background we marked components that will be publish for FREE (after a successful fundraiser).

On the red background we marked optional feature, developed for product owner (after buying the perk).


What We Want To Do & What You Get


User interface (v8 and v9)
  • Material Design. >$20k
  • Clean & Clear, Beautiful, Modern. >$20k
  • Great Usability. >$20k
  • Customization.
  • Mobile, Full Responsive.


Accounting and Finance
  • Accounting Dashboard >$20k
  • Dynamic Reports.
  • Bank Interfaces.
  • Statement Import.
  • Check Printing & Deposit.
  • Your Feature Product Owner


Project Management
  • Timesheets Chrome & Mobile App.. >$50k
  • Forecasts.
  • Gantt Charts.
  • Your Feature Product Owner


Sales Management
  • Customer Portal >$50k
  • Subscriptions >$50k
  • eSignature.
  • Digital products.
  • Your Feature Product Owner


Human Resources
  • Departments Dashboard >$50k
  • Organization Chart.
  • Your Feature Product Owner


Inventory Management
  • Barcode.
  • Shipping.
  • Your Feature Product Owner


Website Builder
  • New Theme >$50k
  • Form Builder.
  • Versioning.
  • A/B Testing.
  • Your Feature Product Owner


E-commerce
  • Shipping Integration.
  • eBay Connector.
  • Amazon Connector.
  • Digital products.
  • Your Feature Product Owner


Marketing
  • Lead Scoring.
  • Email Marketing Templates.
  • Sample Email Templates.
  • Your Feature Product Owner


Point of Sale
  • Loyalty cards.
  • Your Feature Product Owner


Progress of Work


User interface (v8)

Odoo Apps Store:
https://www.odoo.com/apps/themes/8.0/material_backend_theme/

Demo (login: demo , pass: demo):
http://8cells.com:8088/web/login

User interface (v9)

Screenshots (before / after) :
http://8cells.com/odoo/9/1.html
http://8cells.com/odoo/9/2.html
http://8cells.com/odoo/9/3.html
http://8cells.com/odoo/9/4.html
http://8cells.com/odoo/9/5.html
http://8cells.com/odoo/9/6.html


FAQ

What license will these developments fall under?

Every green components will be released in open source (AGPL).

Every full module will have Odoo Apps Store license:
Once you purchase a license for a module, you can use it on as many sites as you like, but you're not allowed to distribute it! 

What version of Odoo is supported?

The user interface is for version 8 and 9.
The rest of the modules will be under version 9.

Who are you?

We are a group of freelancers who work with Odoo many times. We have already created the clean and clear material backend theme for version 8 and several modules for our customers.

Is user interface compatible with other modules?

Yes, it is fully compatible with any of the available modules.

Any other questions?

We are waiting for your questions: contact@8cells.com

story:
ENGLISH

Summary

Hello! We are a group of graduates in nutrition and dietetics with a pretty big motivation for improving the health of all our patients. This is because we had situations on the basis of location and distance could not resolve even though we had the desire to achieve it, as the case of a patient who came to our country to perform surgery and was treated by us, and when the person return to his country suffer a complication and our intervention was needed but because of the distance between us we couldn´t give his the help he needed to the fullest. We want to break those barriers and reach more and more people every day.

Our Online Nutritional consultation service is based on a website that provides a quick and easy way to bring nutritional care services at a low cost, Having the ability to choose the day and time of the consult !

Imagine how many people we could help by not having the limitation of geographical area, we´ll be able to reach every corner of the planet where a food intervention is needed to achieve and improve the health of thousands of people!

What we need and what you get

Although the project does not need a lot of funding, we don´t have all the resources to place it as fully operational right away.

We need a hosting service or suitable accommodation to house our web domain which we already have thanks to the support of some people. To have the system fully operational we need to make design and configure the service to 100 % so we need a trained and qualified person to perform this work .

Also to offer the service you deserve we need to provide adequate equipment and a quality environment so you feel you are in front of us, that´s why we need web cameras and microphones to enhance our equipment (which are quit frankly somewhat old ) .

In order to help achieve our dream and our objectives which is helping allot of people we´ll reward you with the biggest regard we have at the time, our knowledge ! Helping you and your family to improve their lifestyles, achieving those goals you want to obtain but haven’t manage to achieve! Besides you´ll be in our permanent Acknowledgements section and in the future when we have a venue you can count on is your name in stone opening .

If we fail to raise the funds needed, whatever amount raise will be used to continue working on the project and achieve our dream, we have a vision, and a commitment to people so WE ARE GONNA MAKE IT, but with your help it´ll be so much easier!

The impact

The project is important for everyone, we want to reach every corner and to help more and more people achieve their goals, improve their health, change their lives, be present in each place where they need our help ,so consider it´s a project that would help benefit allot of people.

We have every intention and desire to develop this project, we believe that it is feasible and with your help we can achieve this, help and be part of this initiative, we believe that everyone has a mission in the world, and we are confident that we found ours, and you can be a part of it too!.

Risks and Challenges

One of the possible risks that we can find is the resistance to this service, because people usually go to a clinic or health center to get the help of a specialist, but the changes it has brought to the world using internet simplification of life help us overcome these risks, due to the advantages of this project and our great capacity and expertise we are confident that we will manage to reach every corner where we are needed.

Other ways you can help

 If you can´t collaborate, help us share this project with your family, among your friends or people interested in contributing. You can also help through the tools to share Indiegogo.

Also if you have the skills to put the system in operation you can help us do this, allot of people will thank you when you see the changes we helped bring into their lives.

ESPAÑOL

Resumen

¡Hola!, somos un grupo de Licenciados en nutrición y dietetica recién graduados el cual tenemos una motivación bastante grande para lograr mejorar la salud de todos nuestros pacientes. Esto es debido a que se nos presentaron situaciones que por motivos de localidad y distancia no pudimos resolver a pesar de que teníamos las ganas de lograrlo, como el caso de un paciente que vino a nuestro país a realizar una cirugía y fue atendido por nosotros, y al regresar a su país tuvo una complicación de la que fue necesaria nuestra intervencion pero no pudimos lograrlo por la distancia que nos separaba. Queremos romper esas barreras y llegar cada día a mas y mas personas.

El objetivo es ofrecer un servicio en línea capaz de mejorar los hábitos alimentarios, intervenir en caso de enfermedades y cambiar el estilo de vida y ofrecer una vida saludable a un costo accesible para así llegar a clientes sin la limitación de la localidad en donde este encuentre.

El servicio de consulta nutricional en línea se basa en un sitio web donde de manera rápida y sencilla se puedan ofrecer servicios de atencion nutricional a un bajo costo, ¡teniendo la capacidad de elegir el día y el horario de la consulta!

Imagina la cantidad de personas que podríamos ayudar al no tener la limitación del área geográfica, poder llegar a cada rincón del planeta en el cual se necesita una intervención alimentaria y poder lograr mejorar la salud de miles y miles de personas! 

Lo que necesitamos y lo que obtienes

 Aunque el proyecto no necesita de mucha financiación, no podemos contar con los recursos para colocarlo operativo.

Necesitamos contar con un Hosting o servicio de alojamiento adecuado para alojar nuestro dominio web el cual ya contamos gracias al apoyo de algunas personas. Para tener completamente operativo el sistema necesitamos realizar el diseño y configurar el servicio al 100% por lo cual necesitamos una persona capacitada para realizar este trabajo. 

Asimismo para ofrecer el servicio necesitamos equipos adecuados para ofrecer un ambiente y una calidad de tal manera que sientas que estas en frente de nosotros, por lo cual necesitamos cámaras web, micrófonos y potenciar nuestros equipos (que están algo viejos).

De poder ayudar a lograr nuestro sueño y nuestros objetivos el cual es ayudar a muchas personas te recompensaremos con lo mas grande que poseemos en este momento, nuestro conocimiento! Ayudandote a ti y a tu familia a mejorar sus estilos de vida, logrando esos objetivos que quieres cumplir pero no logras alcanzar! Así como estar en nuestro apartado permanente de Agradecimientos y en un futuro cuando tengamos una sede puedes contar con que estará tu nombre en la piedra de inauguración .

En caso de que no logremos recaudar los fondos necesario, lo que recaudemos se utilizara para seguir trabajando en el proyecto y alcanzar nuestro sueño, tenemos una visión, un compromiso con las personas y ¡vamos a lograrlo!

El impacto

El proyecto es importante para todos, queremos lograr llegar a cada rincón y poder ayudar cada vez a mas personas a lograr sus metas, mejorar su salud, cambiar sus vidas, estar presente en cada lugar en donde necesiten nuestra ayuda lo cual consideramos que es un proyecto que ayudara a beneficiar a muchas personas. 

Tenemos todas las intenciones y ganas de desarrollar este proyecto, creemos que es factible y con tu ayuda podemos lograrlo, ayuda y se parte de esta iniciativa, creemos que cada quien tiene una misión en el mundo, y estamos seguros que nosotros encontramos la nuestra, se parte de esta misión tu también 

Riesgos y desafíos

Uno de los posibles Riesgos que nos podemos encontrar es la resistencia a este servicio, debido a que comúnmente se va a un consultorio o centro de salud para obtener la ayuda de un especialista, pero los cambios que ha traído al mundo el uso de internet y la simplificación de la vida nos ayudara a superar estos riesgos, debido a las ventajas de este proyecto y nuestra gran capacidad y conocimientos estamos seguros de que lograremos llegar a cada rincón en donde nos necesiten.

Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar

 Si no puedes colaborar, ayudanos a hacer compartir este proyecto en tu familia, entre tus amigos o personas interesadas en aportar y constribuir. Puedes hacerlo también a través de las herramientas para compartir de Indiegogo

Asimismo si tienes los conocimientos necesarios para lograr colocar en funcionamiento el sistema puedes ayudarnos a realizarlo, mucha gente te agradecerá cuando pueda ver los cambios en sus vidas.

Queremos romper esas barreras y llegar cada día a mas y mas personas.
El objetivo es ofrecer un servicio en línea capaz de mejorar los hábitos alimentarios, intervenir en caso de enfermedades y cambiar el estilo de vida y ofrecer una vida saludable a un costo accesible para así llegar a clientes sin la limitación de la localidad en donde este encuentre.
El servicio de consulta nutricional en línea se basa en un sitio web donde de manera rápida y sencilla se puedan ofrecer servicios de atencion nutricional a un bajo costo, ¡teniendo la capacidad de elegir el día y el horario de la consulta!
Imagina la cantidad de personas que podríamos ayudar al no tener la limitación del área geográfica, poder llegar a cada rincón del planeta en el cual se necesita una intervención alimentaria y poder lograr mejorar la salud de miles y miles de personas! 

Lo que necesitamos y lo que obtienes
 Aunque el proyecto no necesita de mucha financiación, no podemos contar con los recursos para colocarlo operativo.
Necesitamos contar con un Hosting o servicio de alojamiento adecuado para alojar nuestro dominio web el cual ya contamos gracias al apoyo de algunas personas. Para tener completamente operativo el sistema necesitamos realizar el diseño y configurar el servicio al 100% por lo cual necesitamos una persona capacitada para realizar este trabajo. 
Asimismo para ofrecer el servicio necesitamos equipos adecuados para ofrecer un ambiente y una calidad de tal manera que sientas que estas en frente de nosotros, por lo cual necesitamos cámaras web, micrófonos y potenciar nuestros equipos (que están algo viejos).
De poder ayudar a lograr nuestro sueño y nuestros objetivos el cual es ayudar a muchas personas te recompensaremos con lo mas grande que poseemos en este momento, nuestro conocimiento! Ayudandote a ti y a tu familia a mejorar sus estilos de vida, logrando esos objetivos que quieres cumplir pero no logras alcanzar! Así como estar en nuestro apartado permanente de Agradecimientos y en un futuro cuando tengamos una sede puedes contar con que estará tu nombre en la piedra de inauguración .
En caso de que no logremos recaudar los fondos necesario, lo que recaudemos se utilizara para seguir trabajando en el proyecto y alcanzar nuestro sueño, tenemos una visión, un compromiso con las personas y ¡vamos a lograrlo!

El impacto
El proyecto es importante para todos, queremos lograr llegar a cada rincón y poder ayudar cada vez a mas personas a lograr sus metas, mejorar su salud, cambiar sus vidas, estar presente en cada lugar en donde necesiten nuestra ayuda lo cual consideramos que es un proyecto que ayudara a beneficiar a muchas personas. 
Tenemos todas las intenciones y ganas de desarrollar este proyecto, creemos que es factible y con tu ayuda podemos lograrlo, ayuda y se parte de esta iniciativa, creemos que cada quien tiene una misión en el mundo, y estamos seguros que nosotros encontramos la nuestra, se parte de esta misión tu también 

Riesgos y desafíos
Uno de los posibles Riesgos que nos podemos encontrar es la resistencia a este servicio, debido a que comúnmente se va a un consultorio o centro de salud para obtener la ayuda de un especialista, pero los cambios que ha traído al mundo el uso de internet y la simplificación de la vida nos ayudara a superar estos riesgos, debido a las ventajas de este proyecto y nuestra gran capacidad y conocimientos estamos seguros de que lograremos llegar a cada rincón en donde nos necesiten.

Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar
 Si no puedes colaborar, ayudanos a hacer compartir este proyecto en tu familia, entre tus amigos o personas interesadas en aportar y constribuir. Puedes hacerlo también a través de las herramientas para compartir de Indiegogo
Asimismo si tienes los conocimientos necesarios para lograr colocar en funcionamiento el sistema puedes ayudarnos a realizarlo, mucha gente te agradecerá cuando pueda ver los cambios en sus vidas.

story:
WHY GreenHang

Hangers are one of the vastly used day-to-day product in almost every households and clothing outlets. However, with the exponentially growing rapid schedule, handling the washed and ironed apparels are a challenge. Carefully glancing through the existing hangers and doing a quick market survey gave us a clear picture of as to what people are looking for- in a hanger. Firstly, a hanger should be an efficient user-friendly product, which can easily slide through the apparels of any shape and size. Secondly, sliding the cloth into the hanger should not take a longer time. With a product like GreenHang, the clothes can be snuggled at least five time faster than the existing product. Finally, considering the fact that the “eco-friendly” products are the topic of interest, GreenHang will be an eco-friendly hanger composed of a cost-effective biodegradable material.


WHO NEEDS GreenHang

  • Every members in the household who go through hanging the clothes.
  • Every clothing outlets that needs to align the disassembled apparels in the clothing racks.

Market survey

We did a quick market survey in the clothing outlets at North Dakota. The survey consisted of both sales reps and customers who were willing to share their opinions on our new product; the questions for the survey were based on, both, composition of the hanger (biodegradable) and design. Following is the summary of the market survey

WHAT IS UNIQUE ABOUT GreenHang

GreenHang is composed of biodegradable material (corn ethanol by-product distiller's dried grain), which can not only degrade in the environment rapidly, but also can serve as a fertilizer at the stage of wear-and-tear. In the North American continent distillers’ dried grain will be used as a major component to produce biodegradable hanger; corn is one of the main crops in the US. However, the major component can vary from sugar beet pulp to banana peels depending on the demands of hanger. For example, if we have a demand in producing hangers for the individuals in the African continent, we may mainly use banana peels as a major source. The by-products listed above have shown considerable strength and durability to make biodegradable composites.

GreenHang is quick, user-friendly, and an eco-friendly hanger. This can be used to slide through the apparels of any size and shape (expandable) within few seconds. GreenHang is made to meet the need of a large number of people both at households and clothing outlets in a cost effective and a user-friendly manner


MULTIPURPOSE GreenHang


USING GreenHang

  • Medium and/or large clothes

  • Small clothes

All IN ONE GreenHang

  • GreenHang for all purpose

  • Medium and/or large clothes

  • Small clothes
  • GreenHang features

PROJECT STATUS


WHAT IS NEXT

GreenHang campaign starts September 2016 and would be extended to mid of October 2016. This period is needed to collect respective funds for the next stage. Once the funds are collected, the R&D lab will be set-up. The funds will be utilized for the following purposes:

  • Rental for lab space
  • Raw material purchase
  • Chemicals and glassware
  • Administrative and legal assistant
  • Marketing and advertising


HOW ELSE YOU CAN HELP

We will be much more grateful if you can extend your support by providing lab space, administrative, and legal assistance. In addition, spread the word among your friends and family on any social networks to help us help the community.


GreenHang TREATS

We will treat our campaign backers with personalized thank you note from SmartFargo team.


CONTACT US

Please reach us at the email ID mentioned below, for additional questions, concerns, and suggestions.

  • Email : info@smartfargo.com
  • Web : www.greenhang.smartfargo.com
  • Facebook : SmartFargo

story:
Tamale Madness Fundraising Campaign

I am an experienced chef of 38 years that decided to start my own business making homemade Tamales. I have combined my experience as a cook in The United States Navy, and the civilian Culinary Arts Industry,combining my culinary education and practical experiences, and produced a high quality marketable sellable product. I am seeking funds to expand my  business and help it grow. I have cultivated my Tamale business and developed a "cult like following" of a highly desirable product. I have developed a clientele of returning and new clients with my ability and motivation, of believing in myself and my products.  Now is your chance to help a budding entrepreneur to take her business to the next level and build on her firm foundation of existing success. 

My next challenge/hurdle is to retain the proper business licenses and permits in order to produce my products in a licensed food production kitchen. I have already developed and tested an expanded menu of items that I am positive will be highly desirable and palatable.I have made and sold various menu items to new clients that are unable to cook for themselves for a variety of reasons, whether they are to busy (due to work or personal commitments) they are afraid to cook and handle knives, ( veterans with PTSD) or due to hot weather. The positive impact on my community is already being felt,due to high demand of a high quality product thereby making my product an overnight success. I don't cut corners when producing my products, I use organic herbs and spices, and all fresh ingredients and combined with trade secrets/recipes, and my own formulas. The suggested donation is $25 or more but of course whatever you can afford.

story:
The Paw-fect Indoor Dog Boots

At Loft Industries we love pets. Everything we make is designed and assembled with the safety and comfort of the dog or cat in mind. We currently make over 185 different items available in over 1800 different size and color combinations.

For the 20 years we have been in business, we have been passionate about making pets and pet parents lives’ better. We feel that our new Paw-fect Indoor Dog Boots takes this to the next level.

In the past, we have seen lives changed when people have used our training products but, I have never seen such an immediate improvement in a dog’s life as I have seen when these boots are used. Within minutes of placing the Paw-fect Indoor Dog Boots on the paws of a scared dog who had lost his confidence, that dog is once again walking on smooth floors and joining his family instead of laying on the carpet in the pack porch alone, too scared to walk across the linoleum floor in the kitchen. (This was Randy and he is the Collie in our pitch video).

I have seen the same dramatic improvement in the life of an amputee dog. Roxi (a 12 year old Pomeranian) wouldn’t leave the safety of the floor mats to join the family. Her pet parent placed just one boot on her remaining front paw and within seconds she was walking with the rest of the pack. See her video here: https://youtu.be/yqDtSTTZ2PM

When I heard these stories from our first few customers for these boots, I knew we had to get them into the hands of as many pet stores and pet parents as possible, as quickly as possible.

Until now, we have been content to be a regional company selling smaller quantities of superior products to pet stores in our home province of Alberta. We have a fiercely loyal following of people who have purchased our pet gear. Many have contacted us directly when they have moved out of province for replacement items or to outfit their new fur-kids and we happily ship product to them.

With this invention however, it’s time for us to expand and roll out the Paw-fect Indoor Dog Boots across North America. We have already moved into a bigger factory building and we have hired a new team member but, we want to hire even more people and we are willing to grow as large as we need to in order to help as many dogs as we can.

With your help, we can achieve this lofty goal.

Here’s How You Can Help

Here’s What You Get

We are offering some of our superb products in exchange for your contribution:

  1. $55.00 CDN Early Bird Jump Starter Perk: Receive one pair of the Paw-fect Indoor Dog Boots plus 3 bonuses.
    1. Receive one pair of the Paw-fect Indoor Dog Boots perfectly sized for your dog.
    2. Bonus # 1: Free Paw Tracks Pet Gear Hands-Free Waist Belt, so you can walk/run with your dog hands-free. Made from comfortable 1.5” wide webbing with a wide-eye spring snap that securely holds the handle of your existing leash.
    3. Bonus # 2: Free express-post delivery to anywhere in North America.
    4. Bonus # 3: Early-bird delivery. Your perk will be shipped within 30 days of campaign closing.
    5. $87.00  CDN total value.                                                                                                                                      

 

  1. $20.00 and up CDN. Cheerleader. Don't have a dog but still want to help? Make a $20.00 contribution and we will donate $20.00 worth of collars, leashes and/or training products to Lions Foundation of Canada Dog Guides. (Lions Foundation of Canada trains Dog Guides that assist Canadians with a wide range of disabilities. With six programs in place, Canadians with disabilities are offered the opportunity to find greater independence, mobility and safety through the help of a Dog Guide.) Help us help the Lions Foundation of Canada Dog Guides.

Here’s What We Need

If, you watched our pitch video you will notice how we currently assemble the boots. We manufacture our products in Canada so that we are able to keep complete control over the quality of the products and how they are assembled. We carefully sew each boot by hand but this takes time. At the moment it takes about four minutes to sew just one boot from start to finish. With the funds we raise we will purchase a computerized sewing machine (called a pattern tacker) similar to the one shown in this video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Zw7bDHDvKYY

With that new machine, we can sew a boot in 30 seconds!! However, they are expensive, approximately $25,000 each. Instead of borrowing the money from a bank or leasing the machine, we wanted to appeal directly to you, an everyday investor and potential customer. I prefer to put product into someone’s hands in exchange for their contribution. I like to earn my money the old-fashioned way; by working for it!

But you are asking for $60,000?

Let me tell you what else we wish to do with your investment:

  • We need to update our website and create a more customer-friendly experience on the web.
  • We have a marketing firm lined up to help us spread our story in a more effective way.
  • We want to travel to Pet Industry trade shows so we can exhibit and tell even more people about the Paw-fect Indoor Dog Boots and some of our other unique and exclusive items.
  • We want to travel to more consumer shows like pet expos to tell more pet parents about our products and how we can help improve the pet guardian experience.
  • We want to hire even more team members and put more Albertans back to work.
  • Together we will be helping an amazing charity, the Lions Foundation Dog Guides program.

What happens if you raise way more than $60,000?

We will be jumping for joy because you will have confirmed to us how needed this merchandise is. We have a contingency plan for that as well:

  • We would purchase multiple pattern tackers. (With each additional tacker we will be creating at least one additional job).
  • We would purchase a die-cutter to mechanically trim multiple boots at a time making us even more efficient. (Again, another new job).
  • We would be able to buy the fabric in larger quantities, direct from the factory and then be able to offer the Paw-fect Boots in other colors.
  • We would buy our own loom to weave the nylon webbing we use in-house. This would give us even more freedom to offer different and stylish colors.
  • We can even look at expanding into Europe and Australia! (Even more jobs).

The Paw-fect Indoor Dog Boots Are Even More Versatile!

Let me tell you about 2 more uses for these amazing boots:

  1. The unique qualities of the materials we use allow the Paw-fect Indoor Dog Boots to be used as a superior wound boot.
  2. These boots will protect your valuable floors from the damages that dog’s paws can cause. (hardwood, cork, laminate and linoleum will all benefit from the use of these boots).

Unexpectedly, we had to use these boots as a wound-boot ourselves on our dog Riley. A couple of weeks back, we had returned from a walk and Riley was chewing and licking his foot crazily. We went over and pulled the fur back from his toes to take a closer look. Sure enough he had a split between the two middle toes. He had a small mat near the one toe, so we trimmed it up and removed it. I then rinsed Riley’s paw under running water to clean the wound. Next, we put some anti-bacterial cream on the wound and while the paw was still wet, we then put a Paw-fect Boot on him.

Two hours later, I removed the boot to check on his foot. To my amazement, Riley’s paw was completely dry! The fabric has a slight sponge-like backing on it that helps to wick moisture away. I then put the boot back on Riley and put him in his bed for the night.

The next morning, I checked on his foot and he already had a thick healthy scab over the wound. A couple more days with the Paw-fect Boot on and the wound was healed.

Risks & Challenges

Unlike most of the other fine campaigns on this site, we are already in production with this item. We have done all of the research and development for the materials and production methods. That doesn’t mean we won’t see some challenges. Among them:

  • A delay in delivery of the pattern tacker could cause a slight delay in delivery of some perks.
  • It will take about 6 weeks for delivery of the machines. We will place our order before the end of the campaign, once we have confirmed the demand for the boots. This will speed up delivery of the machine(s). If the delay is too long, we can purchase another machine like the one we are currently using and sew them by hand.
  • An overwhelming response could lead to longer delays. To avoid this, we will breakdown the perks into stages that will allow us to stagger the delivery dates to realistic targets. We will do it that way, so everyone will be informed and we be able to keep your confidence as contributors.

One thing I have learned in business is the importance of communication. We will keep all of our contributors in the loop through frequent updates and emails.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to contribute at this time, truly I understand. Many of my customers are struggling in Alberta, so I get it.

But, we’re not just after your money. You can help in other ways:

  • Sign up to receive updates and other information by sending an email to ptpg@shaw.ca.
  • Tell us what you think of our product and our campaign. We value your feedback!
  • Tell your friends and family about the product and our campaign.
  • Subscribe to our YouTube channel at: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCCIPYD1nTdId8BiJrDx_YXg to be sure to be notified when we post new videos and instructional videos for our other products.
  • Share our information and the campaign on your social media platforms.

From all the team here at Loft Industries, thanks for your interest.

An overwhelming response could lead to longer delays. To avoid this, we will breakdown the perks into stages that will allow us to stagger the delivery dates to realistic targets. We will do it that way, so everyone will be informed and we be able to keep your confidence as contributors.
One thing I have learned in business is the importance of communication. We will keep all of our contributors in the loop through frequent updates and emails.Other Ways You Can HelpIf you are unable to contribute at this time, truly I understand. Many of my customers are struggling in Alberta, so I get it.But, we’re not just after your money. You can help in other ways:
Sign up to receive updates and other information by sending an email to ptpg@shaw.ca.
Tell us what you think of our product and our campaign. We value your feedback!
Tell your friends and family about the product and our campaign.
Subscribe to our YouTube channel at: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCCIPYD1nTdId8BiJrDx_YXg to be sure to be notified when we post new videos and instructional videos for our other products.
Share our information and the campaign on your social media platforms.
From all the team here at Loft Industries, thanks for your interest.

story:
Contributions are no longer accepted on indiegogo, please visit our website to pre-order your MWCS. https://blazntech.com/shop/


Items Included with each MWCS:

  • Motorized Cleaner
  • Custom 5.56 Chamber Brush
  • Custom 7.62 Chamber Brush
  • Custom 9mm Brush
  • Custom .45ACP Brush
  • Proprietary Brush-Socks for 9mm and .45ACP Brushes (25pack)
  • Proprietary Brush-Socks for 5.56 and 7.62 Chamber Brushes (25pack)
  • Barrel Brush Extension Rod
  • FrogLube 1.5oz CLP
  • FrogLube 1oz Solvent
  • Lanyard
  • 9v Duracell Battery
  • Ballistic Nylon Case

The MWCS is intended to be used with no disassembly of the weapon; simply insert the cleaner into the chamber via ejection port or barrel, turn it on, and witness the magic! Rotating at 300rpm, the custom nylon brushes cause no damage to the weapon, providing enough rigidity to ensure that carbon, powder residue, and fouling are effectively removed. For lowlight situations, the MWCS also has a built-in LED light option to help with identifying carbon and checking your work.


BLAZnTECH is growing fast, we need your help to fuel our growth, establish mass production,  and continue further development with revolutionary products!


Contributions are no longer accepted on indiegogo, please visit our website to pre-order your MWCS. https://blazntech.com/shop/



BLAZnTECH started life from a combat veterans dream to have weapons maintenance without weapons dissasembly. When it comes to cleaning weapons, there is a considerable amount of time and detail spent in making certain that the job is done right. Soldiers, law enforcement, and tactical units worldwide recognize that a clean weapon saves lives. When the chips are down, there cannot be any grime to cause a malfunction. The release of the BLAZnTECH Motorized Weapons Cleaning system heralds a new era of efficient, effective and enjoyable weapons maintenance. 

With your help, BLAZnTECH is capable of revolutionizing weapons maintenance.  BLAZnTECH has the only product on the market that manages to quickly and effectively (without any disassembly) clean most commonly used rifles and handguns! Made from glass-reinforced nylon, assembled in the United States by people with disabilities, and covered by a lifetime warranty, the MWCS is guaranteed to provide a luxurious cleaning experience. 

In keeping with the highest standards of quality, durability, and value, BLAZnTECH is proud to have established its full assembly with Pride Industries. Pride is a US based, ISO 9001 certified, non-profit company that employs people with disabilities. Not only does this provide the user, with the best possible quality and value, but also it provides us with peace of mind knowing that we are producing a product that we can stand behind with pride and integrity. We wish to create a lasting legacy through quality and dependability, offering products built to exacting standards and created within the United States. Our relationship with Pride Industries is the product of this vision.


Please be sure to use Indiegogo's share tools and help us make some noise about the BLAZnTECH campaign!

  @BLAZnTECH

story:
What is Back of the Yards Coffee Co?

Back of the Yards Coffee Co. is a high quality coffee roaster founded by Mayra Hernandez and Jesse Iñiguez located in the Back of the Yards community that will not only produce great tasting coffee products, but have a direct social and economic impact in the community that we serve. We are establishing relationships with coffee farmers and purchasing directly from them in order to ensure high quality standards and fair wages. By removing middle men we are able to return those savings not only to our customers, but also directly back to the farmers that grow our coffee.

We believe that good quality coffee begins where it is grown, how it is grown and by whom it is grown all the way down to how it is served. We maintain quality by monitoring every step of the process from bean to cup. Which means that not only have we developed standards for our suppliers, but will also train businesses and baristas that serve our products.

We are firm believers that we are products of where we come from. The Back of the Yards Community shaped who we are and provided us the opportunities to grow and become successful. Our goal is to leave our mark and have an impact into the present and future of our community just like it did with us. With every 12 oz bag of coffee that you buy, you can help us accomplish this.

 

What We Need & What You Get

In order to transform Back of the Yards Coffee Co. from dream to reality, we need your help. For us to begin building our coffee shop, start roasting our fresh coffee beans and begin to have a social and economic impact in Nueva Independencia and Back of the Yards, we need to raise $85,000.

The money raised will help us:

  • Secure our storefront, do the build out of the space and buy the necessary equipment to make it a functional coffee shop
  • Purchase and ship green coffee beans from Nueva Independencia farms in Chiapas to Back of the Yards where we will roast them in-house
  • Buy our roaster and begin testing different roasts to develop our flavor profile
  • Begin shipping our roasted coffee beans and serving our freshly brewed coffee at our coffeehouse

For your generosity, we are offering an array of perks that only our first time contributors will have access to. Some of those perks include discounts to our Coffee Club, exclusive access to our first batches of freshly roasted coffee and limited edition merchandise like mugs, tshirts and decals!

The Impact

What makes Back of the Yards Coffee Company unique is that beyond our goal of producing high quality coffee, our mission is to have a direct social and economic impact on the communities of Nueva Independencia, Chiapas and Back of the Yards, Chicago. By bridging the two communities, we are able to address their needs. Nueva Independencia produces high quality coffee beans but needs a point of distribution. In Back of the Yards we have the opportunity to create a business that yields high social and economic returns but we need the harvest that Nueva Independencia can provide. 

Both Mayra and Jesse are natives of the Back of the Yards neighborhood and have a long track record of service in the community. This project is not only an extension of their commitment to the Back of the Yards but also an opportunity to provide a sustainable business with high economic and social returns to a community that is long overdue for a coffee shop.

That is why they understand the importance of doing this as a community. With your help, Back of the Yards Coffee Co. can:

  • Provide new taxable revenue into the local economy

  • Hire locally

  • Offer entrepreneurship training and support

  • And partner up with current initiatives that are working to yield high social and economic returns

Currently $47.5 million leave the Back of the Yards community every year in the form of food and beverage sales. With your help, we intend to revert 1%, or $475,000, of that back into the community through sales of our coffee beans within our first 3 years. 

Additionally, $1 from every 12 oz coffee bag sold will go towards achieving our goal of making an impact in Back of the Yards. By investing in local initiatives with high social returns, we are able to support programming and scholarships in need of funding. Apart from our passion for roasting high quality coffee, investing back into the community that helped us grow is our main driving force.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Like Back of the Yards Coffee and what we are trying to do? Can't make a contribution right now but would still like to help in other ways? Not a problem! Just share this link on your social media networks, via email and through text; talk to your family, friends and neighbors and encourage them to support our cause.

story:
Short Summary

Stephanie and Jenny are passionate about creating an amazing art community through our store.  They have found a delightful old building that is currently being gutted and retrofitted in a revitalized area of Ogden. 

  • Stephanie graduated college, with a major in Psychology and a minor in Sociology and Art. With a passion for giving back to the community she worked in social work for 17 years. She has now been working the last 7 years with the arts in her own business, Our Children's Earth, LLC. She loves expressing her creativity while being eco friendly and staying home with her children. She is excited to help create this amazing community space to support others to accomplish their dreams.
  • Jenny is a junior high wood shop teacher who married Rene, a 16th generation silversmith from Colombia. They create hand crafted fine jewelry and sell it at art festivals. Rene also teaches silversmithing and jewelry making classes out of their garage.
  • Together, Stephanie and Jenny are thrilled to build a fabulous space where local artists can sell their work, others can learn various art mediums through classes and we can all do amazing things working together.


What We Need & What You Get

We are asking for $10,000.

  • $5000 will go towards advertising, marketing and community outreach. We want to open with a bang. In order to do that, we want to get the word out through ads on Facebook, in the local newspaper as well as local magazines.  We also will create flyers to distribute around town. 
  • $1500  will be used for furniture and fixtures.  We love to reuse, recycle and even upcycle. We have bought most of our display cases and racks at yard sales and from businesses that no longer need theirs.  A portion of this money will also purchase paint for the walls and the cement floor.
  • $1000 for our big store front sign as well as a smaller sign for the back door that will open into The Neon Park, which will be finished next year.
  • $1250 will purchase supplies for our studio space that artists and students can use.
  • $1250 will purchase furniture, table and supplies for our classroom.

The Impact

Your contributions will be wisely used to create an prodigious art space in our community.  Ogden has long been considered the armpit of Utah with a colorful past. During the last 10 years, there has been a grass roots revitalization and renascence though out our beloved O-Town and especially to the down town area. Ogden is now often ranked by national associations as a favorite ski town, small town and our down town 25th Street is a ranked favorite street in the USA. 

We are renting a part of the Kiesel Building, that has a long, rich history that spans a century. It has been empty for several years. The building has recently been bought and is in the process of being completly remodeled.  The ground level will host several retail stores, including ours. The second story will house a high-tech business, slated to open in less than six weeks.  The  top two floors will become office and business space so that it can maintain its vintage charm.  Adjacent to the building, a new park will replace a dilapidated parking lot.  Behind the building, the city is cleaning out the alley way and will create a parking lot to accommodate about 200 cars. 

    • We have 13 artists who have already signed up with us to sell their art through our membership option. They will be paying us a monthly fee and working in the store in exchange for selling their art and teaching classes in our space.
    • We have about 15 other artists that have committed to selling their work on consignment.
    • This collective gives artists a chance to have a space that before was unaffordable.
    • All artists who work with us must live or work in Weber County, making our shop truly a local's artist collective.

Risks & Challenges

We realize all ventures require risks. We are working hard to keep our risks to a minimum.    We have met with business leaders and owners, researched other art coops and collectives and met with the Small Business Administration mentors while we created our detailed business plan that is a hybrid between a co-op and a consignment store.

  • We see our biggest challenge as getting people to come to our place.  The store is located on a side street between two big shopping and entertainment centers in Ogden, 25th Street and The Junction.  The city is working to build a bridge between these two areas and we are in the middle of that bridge. We see this as a great opportunity to welcome new customers, locals and visitors as well.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    We understand that not all who read this will be able to contribute financially.  There are other ways one can help us reach our goal.

    • Share our link on your social media pages--Facebook, Twitter, SnapChat, Instagram and email. The more that know about our project, the more likely we are to reach our goal.
    • Indiegogo makes it easy to share with their user friendly tools.
    • Follow us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/LocalArtisanCollective
    • Celebrate with us at our grand opening, scheduled for September 2, 2016.

    Thank you so much for your interest in helping us make The Local Artisan Collective a reality!

 Indiegogo makes it easy to share with their user friendly tools.

story:
The Impact

The young people we work with typically leave school with little or no prospects of employment or further education. Many have had years of difficulties in their home lives.

Without programmes like Against the Grain they often end up homeless, addicted or at worse with criminal convictions. 

Matt, George and John who are our first three trainees, say the project has already helped them gain knowledge of upholstery and finishing techniques, improved their confidence and taught them about working in teams. 

The programme has a positive impact on young people as well as a positive impact on our environment. By upcycling furniture we are helping to reduce landfill and restore things that have plenty more life in them yet.

What We Need & What You Get

We are looking for support in all shapes and sizes including volunteer tradespeople, donated furniture, money, a van and driver, paint, upholstery fabric and other items that can be upcycled and sold,

Please visit our new crowdfunding page to find out more about our campaign.

Go to https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/against-the-...
